 1 TAWARIKH

FIRST CHRONICLES

 

 

Penulis: Aslinya, Kitab 1 dan 2Tawarikh adalah satu kitab dalam Kitab Suci Ibrani. Kitab-kitab ini kemungkinan ditulis oleh Ezra (cf. 2 Taw. 36:22-23 dan Ezr. 1:1-3a).

Author: Originally, 1 and 2 Chronicles were one book in the Hebrew Scriptures. They were probably written by Ezra (cf. 2 Chron. 36:22-23 and Ezra 1:1-3a).

 

 

Waktu Penulisan: Kemungkinan setelah 458 SM, selama pemerintahan Artahsasta, raja Persia (Ezr. 7:1), ketika Ezra kembali dari Babel ke Yerusalem (Ezr. 8:31-32).

Time of Writing: Probably after 458 B.C., during the reign of Artaxerxes the king of Persia (Ezra 7:1), when Ezra returned from Babylon to Jerusalem (Ezra 8:31-32).

 

 

Tempat Penulisan: Kemungkinan di Yerusalem.

Place of Writing: Perhaps in Jerusalem.

 

 

Rentang Waktu yang Tercakup: Dua kitab mencakup 517 tahun: Kitab 1Tawarikh mencakup sekitar 41 tahun (tidak termasuk silsilah nenek moyang dalam ps. 1-9), dari 1056 SM sampai 1015 SM, yaitu dari kematian Saul (ps. 10) sampai kematian Daud (29:28); Kitab 2Tawarikh mencakup sekitar 476 tahun, dari 1015 SM sampai 539 SM, yaitu dari berkuasanya Salomo (1:1) sampai tahun pertama Koresh, raja Persia (36:22).

Time Period Covered: The two books cover 517 years: 1 Chronicles covers about forty-one years (excluding the forefathers' genealogy in chs. 19), from 1056 B.C. to 1015 B.C., that is, from the death of Saul (ch. 10) to the death of David (29:28); 2 Chronicles covers about 476 years, from 1015 B.C. to 539 B.C., that is, from the reign of Solomon (1:1) to the first year of Cyrus the king of Persia (36:22).

 

 

Pokok 1 dan 2 Tawarikh: Kronologi Lengkap dari Pergerakan Allah dalam Sejarah Manusia Mulai dari Adam Sampai Samuel Hingga Kembalinya Orang Israel dari Penawanan, Beserta Penyajian Beberapa Rincian Penting dari Penanggulangan Allah atas Raja-raja Yehuda

Subject of 1 & 2 Chronicles: A Full Chronology of God's Move in Man's History from Adam through Samuel to Israel's Return from Their Captivity, with a Presentation of Some of the Important Details of God's Dealing with the Kings of Judah

A. The genealogy from Adam to Abraham

1:1-27

1:1-27

 

 

1:1 1aAdam, bSet, Enos,

1:1 1a Adam, b Seth, Enosh,

1:2 Kenan, Mahalaleel, Yared,

1:2 Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,

1:3 Henokh, Metusalah, Lamekh,

1:3 Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

1:4 Nuh, aSem, Ham dan Yafet.

1:4 Noah, a Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

1:5 aKeturunan Yafet ialah Gomer, Magog, Madai, Yawan, Tubal, Mesekh dan Tiras.

1:5 a The sons of Japheth: Gomer and Magog and Madai and Javan and Tubal and Meshech and Tiras.

1:6 Keturunan Gomer ialah Askenas, Difat dan Togarma.

1:6 And the sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz and Diphath and Togarmah.

1:7 Keturunan Yawan ialah Elisa, Tarsis, orang Kitim dan orang Rodanim.

1:7 And the sons of Javan: Elishah and Tarshish, Kittim and Rodanim.

1:8 aKeturunan Ham ialah Kush, Misraim, Put dan Kanaan.

1:8 a The sons of Ham: Cush and Mizraim, Put and Canaan.

1:9 Keturunan Kush ialah Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raema dan Sabtekha; keturunan Raema ialah Syeba dan Dedan.

1:9 And the sons of Cush: Seba and Havilah and Sabta and Raama and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.

1:10 Kush memperanakkan Nimrod; dialah orang yang mula-mula sekali berkuasa di bumi.

1:10 And Cush begot Nimrod: He began to be a mighty one on the earth.

1:11 aMisraim memperanakkan orang Ludim, orang Anamim, orang Lehabim, orang Naftuhim,

1:11 a And Mizraim begot the Ludim and the Anamim and the Lehabim and the Naphtuhim

1:12 orang Patrusim, orang Kasluhim - dari mereka inilah berasal orang Filistin - dan orang Kaftorim.

1:12 And the Pathrusim and the Casluhim, from which came the Philistines, and the Caphtorim.

1:13 Kanaan memperanakkan Sidon, anak sulungnya dan Het,

1:13 And Canaan begot Sidon his firstborn and Heth

1:14 serta orang Yebusi, orang Amori, orang Girgasi,

1:14 And the Jebusites and the Amorites and the Girgashites

1:15 orang Hewi, orang Arki, orang Sini,

1:15 And the Hivites and the Arkites and the Sinites

1:16 orang Arwadi, orang Semari dan orang Hamati.

1:16 And the Arvadites and the Zemarites and the Hamathites.

1:17 aKeturunan Sem ialah Elam, Asyur, Arpakhsad, Lud, Aram, Us, Hul, Geter dan Mesekh.

1:17 a The sons of Shem: Elam and Asshur and Arpachshad and Lud and Aram and Uz and Hul and Gether and Meshech.

1:18 Arpakhsad memperanakkan Selah, dan Selah memperanakkan Eber.

1:18 And Arpachshad begot Shelah, and Shelah begot Eber.

1:19 Bagi Eber lahir dua anak laki-laki; nama yang seorang ialah Peleg, sebab dalam zamannya penduduk bumi terbagi, dan nama adiknya ialah Yoktan.

1:19 And to Eber were born two sons: The name of the one was Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided; and his brothers name was Joktan.

1:20 Yoktan memperanakkan Almodad, Selef, Hazar-Mawet, Yerah,

1:20 And Joktan begot Almodad and Sheleph and Hazarmaveth and Jerah

1:21 Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,

1:21 And Hadoram and Uzal and Diklah

1:22 Ebal, Abimael, Syeba,

1:22 And Ebal and Abimael and Sheba

1:23 Ofir, Hawila dan Yobab; itulah semuanya anak-anak Yoktan.

1:23 And Ophir and Havilah and Jobab; all these were the sons of Joktan.

1:24 aSem, Arpakhsad, Selah,

1:24 a Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah,

1:25 Eber, Peleg, Rehu,

1:25 Eber, Peleg, Reu,

1:26 Serug, Nahor, Terah,

1:26 Serug, Nahor, Terah,

1:27 Abram, itulah aAbraham.

1:27 Abram (the same is a Abraham).

1:28-34

1:28-34

 

 

1:28 Anak-anak Abraham ialah aIshak dan Ismael.

1:28 The sons of Abraham: a Isaac and Ishmael.

1:29 aInilah keturunan mereka: anak sulung Ismael ialah Nebayot, lalu Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,

1:29 a These are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar and Adbeel and Mibsam;

1:30 Misyma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tema,

1:30 Mishma and Dumah; Massa, Hadad, and Tema;

1:31 Yetur, Nafish dan Kedma; mereka itulah anak-anak Ismael.

1:31 Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah; these were the sons of Ishmael.

1:32 aKeturunan Ketura, gundik Abraham: perempuan itu melahirkan Zimran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isybak dan Suah. Anak-anak Yoksan ialah Syeba dan Dedan.

1:32 a And the sons of Keturah, Abrahams concubine: She bore Zimran and Jokshan and Medan and Midian and Ishbak and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.

1:33 Anak-anak Midian ialah: Efa, Efer, Hanokh, Abida dan Eldaa. Itulah semuanya keturunan Ketura.

1:33 And the sons of Midian: Ephah and Epher and Hanoch and Abida and Eldaah. All these were the sons of Keturah.

1:34 Abraham memperanakkan 1Ishak. Anak-anak Ishak ialah aEsau dan 2bIsrael.

1:34 And Abraham begot 1 Isaac. The sons of Isaac: a Esau and 2b Israel.

 

 

C. Silsilah Esau

C. The genealogy of Esau

1:35-54

1:35-54

 

 

1:35 aAnak-anak Esau ialah Elifas, Rehuel, Yeush, Yaelam dan Korah.

1:35 a The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam and Korah.

1:36 Anak-anak Elifas ialah Teman, Omar, Zefi, Gaetam, Kenas, Timna dan Amalek.

1:36 The sons of Eliphaz: Teman and Omar, Zephi and Gatam, Kenaz and Timna and Amalek.

1:37 Anak-anak Rehuel ialah Nahat, Zerah, Syama dan Miza.

1:37 The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

1:38 aAnak-anak Seir ialah Lotan, Syobal, Zibeon, Ana, Disyon, Ezer dan Disyan.

1:38 a And the sons of Seir: Lotan and Shobal and Zibeon and Anah and Dishon and Ezer and Dishan.

1:39 Anak-anak Lotan ialah Hori dan Homam; adik perempuan Lotan ialah Timna.

1:39 And the sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam. And Lotans sister: Timna.

1:40 Anak-anak Syobal ialah Alyan, Manahat, Ebal, Syefi dan Onam; anak-anak Zibeon ialah Aya dan Ana.

1:40 The sons of Shobal: Alian and Manahath and Ebal, Shephi and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.

1:41 Keturunan Ana ialah Disyon; anak-anak Disyon ialah Hamran, Esyban, Yitran dan Keran.

1:41 The 1 son of Anah: Dishon. And the sons of Dishon: Hamran and Eshban and Ithran and Cheran.

1:42 Anak-anak Ezer ialah Bilhan, Zaawan dan Yaakan. Anak-anak Disyan ialah Us dan Aran.

1:42 The sons of Ezer: Bilhan and Zaavan, Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.

1:43 aInilah raja-raja yang memerintah di tanah Edom, sebelum seorang raja dari orang Israel memerintah: Bela bin Beor, dan kotanya bernama Dinhaba.

1:43 a And these are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before a king of the children of Israel reigned: Bela the son of Beor; and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

1:44 Setelah Bela mati, Yobab bin Zerah, dari Bozra, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

1:44 And Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.

1:45 Setelah Yobab mati, Husyam, dari negeri orang Teman, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

1:45 And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.

1:46 Setelah Husyam mati, Hadad bin Bedad menjadi raja menggantikan dia; dialah yang memukul kalah orang Midian di daerah Moab, dan kotanya bernama Awit.

1:46 And Husham died; and Hadad the son of Bedad, who struck Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Avith.

1:47 Setelah Hadad mati, Samla, dari Masyreka menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

1:47 And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.

1:48 Setelah Samla mati, Saul, dari Rehobot-Sungai, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

1:48 And Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in his place.

1:49 Setelah Saul mati, Baal-Hanan bin Akhbor menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

1:49 And Shaul died, and Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his place.

1:50 Setelah Baal-Hanan mati, Hadad menjadi raja menggantikan dia, dan kotanya bernama Pahi dan isterinya bernama Mehetabeel binti Matred binti Mezahab.

1:50 And Baal-hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his place. And the name of his city was Pai; and his wifes name was Mehetabel the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

1:51 Setelah Hadad mati, maka yang menjadi kepala-kepala kaum di Edom ialah kepala kaum Timna, kepala kaum Alya, kepala kaum Yetet,

1:51 And Hadad died. And the 1 clans of Edom were: Clan Timna, Clan Aliah, Clan Jetheth,

1:52 kepala kaum Oholibama, kepala kaum Ela, kepala kaum Pinon,

1:52 Clan Oholibamah, Clan Elah, Clan Pinon,

1:53 kepala kaum Kenas, kepala kaum Teman, kepala kaum Mibzar,

1:53 Clan Kenaz, Clan Teman, Clan Mibzar,

1:54 kepala kaum Magdiel dan kepala kaum Iram. Itulah kepala-kepala kaum di Edom.

1:54 Clan Magdiel, Clan Iram. These were the clans of Edom.

2. Silsilah Yehuda

2. The genealogy of Judah

2:3-4:23

2:3-4:23

 

 

2:3 Anak-anak 1Yehuda ialah aEr, Onan dan Syela, tiga orang, yang lahir bagi dia dari anak perempuan Syua perempuan Kanaan itu. Tetapi Er, anak sulung Yehuda itu, adalah jahat di mata Tuhan, maka Ia membunuhnya.

2:3 The sons of 1 Judah: a Er and Onan and Shelah, which three were born to him by 2 Bath-shua the Canaanitess. And Er, Judahs firstborn, was wicked in the sight of Jehovah; and He slew him.

2:4 1aTamar, menantu perempuan Yehuda, melahirkan baginya 1bPeres dan Zerah. Semuanya anak-anak Yehuda ada lima orang.

2:4 And 1a Tamar his daughter-in-law bore him 1b Perez and Zerah. The sons of Judah were five in all.

2:5 Anak-anak aPeres ialah Hezron dan Hamul.

2:5 The sons of a Perez: Hezron and Hamul.

2:6 Anak-anak Zerah ialah Zimri, Etan, Heman, Kalkol dan Dara. Semuanya lima orang.

2:6 And the sons of Zerah: Zimri and Ethan and Heman and Calcol and Dara; five of them in all.

2:7 1Keturunan Karmi ialah Ahar, yang amencelakakan orang Israel karena ia tidak taat dalam hal barang-barang yang dikhususkan itu.

2:7 And the 1 son of Carmi: Achar, the a troubler of Israel, who transgressed by what was accursed.

2:8 Keturunan Etan ialah Azarya.

2:8 And the son of Ethan: Azariah.

2:9 Anak-anak yang lahir bagi aHezron ialah Yerahmeel, Ram dan Khelubai.

2:9 And the sons of a Hezron, who were born to him: Jerahmeel and Ram and Chelubai.

2:10 Ram memperanakkan Aminadab, dan Aminadab memperanakkan Nahason, pemimpin bani Yehuda.

2:10 And Ram begot Amminadab, and Amminadab begot Nahshon, the prince of the children of Judah;

2:11 Nahason memperanakkan Salma dan Salma memperanakkan 1Boas.

2:11 And Nahshon begot Salma, and Salma begot 1 Boaz,

2:12 Boas memperanakkan Obed dan Obed memperanakkan Isai.

2:12 And Boaz begot Obed, and Obed begot Jesse;

2:13 Isai memperanakkan aEliab, anak sulungnya, dan Abinadab, anak yang kedua, Simea, anak yang ketiga,

2:13 And Jesse begot his firstborn a Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimea the third,

2:14 Netaneel, anak yang keempat, Radai, anak yang kelima,

2:14 Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

2:15 Ozem, anak yang keenam, dan aDaud, anak yang ketujuh;

2:15 Ozem the sixth, a David the seventh;

2:16 saudara-saudara perempuan mereka ialah Zeruya dan Abigail. Anak-anak aZeruya ialah Abisai, Yoab dan Asael, tiga orang.

2:16 And their sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail. And the sons of a Zeruiah: Abishai and Joab and Asahel, three.

2:17 Abigail melahirkan aAmasa dan ayah Amasa ialah Yeter, orang Ismael itu.

2:17 And Abigail bore a Amasa, and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.

2:18 Kaleb bin Hezron memperanakkan Yeriot dari Azuba, isterinya; dan inilah anak-anak perempuan itu: Yesyer, Sobab dan Ardon.

2:18 And Caleb the son of Hezron had children by Azubah his wife, and by Jerioth; her sons are these: Jesher and Shobab and Ardon.

2:19 Sesudah Azuba mati, Kaleb mengawini Efrat yang melahirkan aHur baginya.

2:19 And Azubah died; and Caleb took Ephrath to himself, and she bore him a Hur.

2:20 Hur memperanakkan Uri dan Uri memperanakkan aBezaleel.

2:20 And Hur begot Uri, and Uri begot a Bezaleel.

2:21 Sesudah itu Hezron menghampiri anak perempuan Makhir, bapa Gilead. Ia mengawini perempuan itu ketika ia berumur enam puluh tahun. Perempuan itu melahirkan Segub baginya.

2:21 And afterward Hezron went to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead and took her when he was sixty years old; and she bore him Segub.

2:22 Segub memperanakkan Yair yang mempunyai dua puluh tiga perkampungan di tanah Gilead.

2:22 And Segub begot Jair, who had twenty-three cities in the land of Gilead.

2:23 Tetapi Gesur dan Aram merebut Hawot-Yair dari pada mereka, juga Kenat dan tempat-tempat jajahannya, enam puluh perkampungan. Itulah semuanya keturunan Makhir, bapa Gilead.

2:23 And Geshur and Aram took the villages of Jair from them, with Kenath and its villages, sixty cities. All these were sons of Machir the father of Gilead.

2:24 Sesudah Hezron mati, Kaleb menghampiri Efrata - dia adalah isteri Hezron, ayahnya - maka perempuan itu melahirkan baginya Asyhur, bapa Tekoa.

2:24 And after the death of Hezron in Caleb-ephrathah, Abijah, Hezrons wife, bore him Ashhur, the father of Tekoa.

2:25 Anak-anak Yerahmeel, anak sulung Hezron, ialah Ram, anak sulung, Buna, Oren, Ozem dan Ahia.

2:25 And the sons of Jerahmeel, the firstborn of Hezron, were: Ram the firstborn and Bunah and Oren and Ozem and Ahijah.

2:26 Tetapi Yerahmeel mempunyai seorang isteri lain, bernama Atara; dialah ibu Onam.

2:26 And Jerahmeel had another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

2:27 Anak-anak Ram, anak sulung Yerahmeel, ialah Maas, Yamin dan Eker.

2:27 And the sons of Ram, the firstborn of Jerahmeel, were Maaz and Jamin and Eker.

2:28 Anak-anak Onam ialah Samai dan Yada, dan anak-anak Samai ialah Nadab dan Abisur.

2:28 And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. And the sons of Shammai: Nadab and Abishur.

2:29 Nama isteri Abisur ialah Abihail yang melahirkan Ahban dan Molid baginya.

2:29 And the name of Abishurs wife was Abihail, and she bore him Ahban and Molid.

2:30 Anak-anak Nadab ialah Seled dan Apaim; Seled mati dengan tidak mempunyai anak.

2:30 And the sons of Nadab: Seled and Appaim; and Seled died without sons.

2:31 Keturunan Apaim ialah Yisei, dan keturunan Yisei ialah Sesan, dan keturunan Sesan ialah Ahlai.

2:31 And the 1 son of Appaim: Ishi; and the 1 son of Ishi: Sheshan; and the 1 son of Sheshan: Ahlai.

2:32 Anak-anak Yada, adik Samai, ialah Yeter dan Yonatan; Yeter mati dengan tidak mempunyai anak.

2:32 And the sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai: Jether and Jonathan; and Jether died without sons.

2:33 Anak-anak Yonatan ialah Pelet dan Zaza. Itulah keturunan Yerahmeel.

2:33 And the sons of Jonathan: Peleth and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

2:34 Sesan tidak mempunyai anak laki-laki, hanya anak-anak perempuan; tetapi Sesan mempunyai seorang budak laki-laki, orang Mesir, yang bernama Yarha.

2:34 And Sheshan had no sons but daughters; and Sheshan had an Egyptian servant, whose name was Jarha.

2:35 Jadi Sesan memberi anaknya kepada Yarha, budaknya itu, menjadi isteri, lalu perempuan itu melahirkan Atai baginya.

2:35 And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant as his wife, and she bore him Attai.

2:36 Atai memperanakkan Natan, dan Natan memperanakkan Zabad.

2:36 And Attai begot Nathan, and Nathan begot Zabad,

2:37 Zabad memperanakkan Eflal, dan Eflal memperanakkan Obed.

2:37 And Zabad begot Ephlal, and Ephlal begot Obed,

2:38 Obed memperanakkan Yehu, dan Yehu memperanakkan Azarya.

2:38 And Obed begot Jehu, and Jehu begot Azariah,

2:39 Azarya memperanakkan Heles, dan Heles memperanakkan Elasa.

2:39 And Azariah begot Helez, and Helez begot Eleasah,

2:40 Elasa memperanakkan Sismai, dan Sismai memperanakkan Salum.

2:40 And Eleasah begot Sismai, and Sismai begot Shallum,

2:41 Salum memperanakkan Yekamya, dan Yekamya memperanakkan Elisama.

2:41 And Shallum begot Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begot Elishama.

2:42 Keturunan Kaleb, adik Yerahmeel, ialah Mesa, anak sulungnya, bapa Zif, dan anak-anak Maresa, bapa Hebron.

2:42 And the sons of Caleb, the brother of Jerahmeel, were Mesha his firstborn, who was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

2:43 Anak-anak Hebron ialah Korah, Tapuah, Rekem dan Sema.

2:43 And the sons of Hebron: Korah and Tappuah and Rekem and Shema.

2:44 Sema memperanakkan Raham, bapa Yorkeam, dan Rekem memperanakkan Samai.

2:44 And Shema begot Raham, the father of Jorkeam. And Rekem begot Shammai;

2:45 Anak Samai ialah Maon, dan Maon ialah bapa Bet-Zur.

2:45 And the son of Shammai was Maon; and Maon was the father of Beth-zur.

2:46 Efa, gundik Kaleb, melahirkan Haran, Moza dan Gazes; Haran memperanakkan Gazes.

2:46 And Ephah, Calebs concubine, bore Haran and Moza and Gazez; and Haran begot Gazez.

2:47 Anak-anak Yohdai ialah Regem, Yotam, Gesan, Pelet, Efa dan Saaf.

2:47 And the sons of Jahdai: Regem and Jotham and Geshan and Pelet and Ephah and Shaaph.

2:48 Gundik Kaleb, yakni Maakha, melahirkan Seber dan Tirhana.

2:48 Maacah, Calebs concubine, bore Sheber and Tirhanah;

2:49 Perempuan itu melahirkan juga Saaf, bapa Madmana, dan Sewa, bapa Makhbena dan bapa Gibea; anak perempuan Kaleb ialah Akhsa.

2:49 And she bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbena and the father of Gibea. And the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.

2:50 Itulah keturunan Kaleb. Anak-anak Hur, anak sulung aEfrata, ialah Sobal, bapa Kiryat-Yearim,

2:50 These are the sons of Caleb. The 1 sons of Hur, the firstborn of a Ephrathah: Shobal the father of Kiriath-jearim,

2:51 Salma, bapa Betlehem dan Haref, bapa Bet-Gader.

2:51 Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Beth-gader.

2:52 Sobal, bapa Kiryat-Yearim, mempunyai keturunan, yakni HaroE dan setengah orang Menuhot.

2:52 And Shobal the father of Kiriath-jearim had sons: Haroeh and half of the Menuhoth.

2:53 Dan kaum-kaum Kiryat-Yearim ialah orang Yetri, orang Puti, orang Sumati dan orang Misrai; dari mereka inilah berasal orang Zora dan orang Esytaol.

2:53 And the families of Kiriath-jearim were the Ithrites and the Puthites and the Shumathites and the Mishraites; from them came the Zorathites and the Eshtaolites.

2:54 Keturunan Salma ialah Betlehem, orang Netofa, Atarot-Bet-Yoab dan setengah orang Manahti, yakni orang Zori.

2:54 The sons of Salma: Bethlehem and the Netophathites, Atroth-beth-joab and half the Manahathites, the Zorites.

2:55 Dan kaum-kaum para ahli surat, yang diam di Yabes, ialah orang Tirati, orang Simati, dan orang Sukhati. Mereka itulah orang Keni keturunan Hamat bapa keluarga aRekhab.

2:55 And the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez: the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, the Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came from Hammath, the father of the house of a Rechab.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 3

1 CHRONICLES 3

 

 

3:1 aInilah anak-anak Daud yang lahir bagi dia di Hebron; anak sulung ialah Amnon, dari Ahinoam, perempuan Yizreel; anak yang kedua ialah Daniel, dari Abigail, perempuan Karmel;

3:1 a And these are the sons of David, who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn Amnon, by Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, by Abigail the Carmelitess;

3:2 anak yang ketiga ialah Absalom, anak Maakha, yakni anak perempuan Talmai, raja Gesur; anak yang keempat ialah Adonia, anak Hagit;

3:2 The third, Absalom the son of Maacah, the daughter of Talmai the king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith;

3:3 anak yang kelima ialah Sefaca, dari Abital; anak yang keenam ialah Yitream, dari Egla, isterinya itu.

3:3 The fifth, Shephatiah by Abital; the sixth, Ithream, by Eglah his wife.

3:4 Enam orang lahir bagi dia di Hebron, di mana ia memerintah atujuh tahun enam bulan lamanya; dan btiga puluh tiga tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

3:4 Six were born to him in Hebron. And he reigned there a seven years and six months; and he reigned in Jerusalem b thirty-three years.

3:5 aInilah yang lahir bagi dia di Yerusalem: Simea, Sobab, 1Natan dan 1bSalomo, empat orang dari 2Batsyua binti Amiel,

3:5 a And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea and Shobab and 1 Nathan and 1b Solomon: four, by 2 Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel;

3:6 lalu Yibhar, Elisama, Elifelet,

3:6 And Ibhar and Elishama and Eliphelet

3:7 Nogah, Nefeg, Yafia,

3:7 And Nogah and Nepheg and Japhia

3:8 Elisama, Elyada dan Elifelet, sembilan orang.

3:8 And Elishama and Eliada and Eliphelet, nine.

3:9 Semuanya itu anak-anak Daud, belum terhitung anak-anak dari gundik-gundik. aTamar ialah saudara perempuan mereka.

3:9 All were sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines; and a Tamar was their sister.

3:10 aKeturunan Salomo ialah 1Rehabeam; anak orang ini ialah Abia; anak orang ini ialah Asa; anak orang ini ialah Yosafat;

3:10 a And Solomons son was 1 Rehoboam; Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

3:11 anak orang ini ialah Yoram; anak orang ini ialah Ahazia; anak orang ini ialah Yoas;

3:11 Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

3:12 anak orang ini ialah Amazia; anak orang ini ialah 1Azarya; anak orang ini ialah Yotam;

3:12 Amaziah his son, 1 Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

3:13 anak orang ini ialah Ahas; anak orang ini ialah Hizkia; anak orang ini ialah Manasye;

3:13 Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

3:14 anak orang ini ialah Amon; anak orang ini ialah Yosia.

3:14 Amon his son, Josiah his son.

3:15 aAnak-anak Yosia: anak sulung ialah Yohanan, anak yang kedua ialah 1Yoyakim, anak yang ketiga ialah Zedekia dan anak yang keempat ialah Salum.

3:15 a And the sons of Josiah: the firstborn Johanan, the second 1 Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

3:16 Keturunan Yoyakim ialah 1Yekhonya, anaknya itu, dan anak orang ini ialah Zedekia.

3:16 And the 1 son of Jehoiakim: 2 Jeconiah his son; Zedekiah his son.

3:17 Anak-anak aYekhonya, orang kurungan itu, ialah Sealtiel, anaknya,

3:17 And the sons of a Jeconiah, the captive: Shealtiel his son,

3:18 lalu Malkhiram, Pedaya, Syenasar, Yekamya, Hosama dan Nedabya.

3:18 And Malchiram and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Neda-biah.

3:19 Anak-anak Pedaya ialah 1aZerubabel dan Simei, dan anak-anak Zerubabel ialah Mesulam dan Hananya; Selomit ialah saudara perempuan mereka;

3:19 And the sons of Pedaiah were 1a Zerubbabel and Shimei. And the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister;

3:20 lalu Hasuba, Ohel, Berekhya, Hasaja dan Yusab-Hesed, lima orang.

3:20 And Hashubah and Ohel and Berechiah and Hasadiah and Jushab-hesed, five.

3:21 Anak-anak Hananya ialah Pelaca dan Yesaya; anak orang ini ialah Refaya; anak orang ini ialah Arnan; anak orang ini ialah Obaja, dan anak orang ini ialah Sekhanya.

3:21 And the 1 sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Isaiah, the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shecaniah.

3:22 Anak-anak Sekhanya ialah Semaya, dan anak-anak Semaya ialah Hatus, Yigal, Bariah, Nearya dan Safat, enam orang.

3:22 And the sons of Shecaniah: Shemaiah; and the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush and Igal and Bariah and Neariah and Shaphat, six.

3:23 Anak-anak Nearya ialah ElyoEnai, Hizkia, dan Azrikam, tiga orang.

3:23 And the sons of Neariah: Elioenai and Hezekiah and Azrikam, three.

3:24 Anak-anak ElyoEnai ialah Hodawya, Elyasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yohanan, Delaya dan Anani, tujuh orang.

3:24 And the sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah and Eliashib and Pelaiah and Akkub and Johanan and Delaiah and Anani, seven.

1 TAWARIKH 4

1 CHRONICLES 4

 

 

4:1 Anak-anak Yehuda ialah aPeres, Hezron, Karmi, Hur dan Syobal.

4:1 The sons of Judah: a Perez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur and Shobal.

4:2 Reaya, anak Syobal, memperanakkan Yahat, dan Yahat memperanakkan Ahumai dan Lahad. Itulah kaum-kaum orang Zora.

4:2 And Reaiah the son of Shobal begot Jahath; and Jahath begot Ahumai and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.

4:3 Inilah anak-anak Etam: Yizreel, Isma dan Idbas; nama saudara perempuan mereka ialah Hazelelponi;

4:3 And these were the sons of the father of Etam: Jezreel and Ishma and Idbash; and the name of their sister was Hazzelelponi;

4:4 lalu Pnuel, bapa Gedor, dan Ezer, bapa Husa. Itulah keturunan Hur, anak sulung Efrata, bapa Betlehem.

4:4 And Penuel the father of Gedor and Ezer the father of Hushah; these were the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, the father of Bethlehem.

4:5 Asyur, bapa Tekoa, mempunyai dua isteri, yakni Hela dan Naara.

4:5 And Ashhur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.

4:6 Naara melahirkan baginya Ahuzam, Hefer, Temeni dan orang Ahastari. Itulah anak-anak Naara.

4:6 And Naarah bore him Ahuzzam and Hepher and Temeni and Haahashtari; these were the sons of Naarah.

4:7 Anak-anak Hela ialah Zeret, 1Yezohar dan Etnan.

4:7 And the sons of Helah: Zereth, 1 Izhar, and Ethnan.

4:8 Kos memperanakkan Anub, Hazobeba dan kaum-kaum Aharhel bin Harum.

4:8 And Koz begot Anub and Zobebah and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.

4:9 Yabes lebih dimuliakan dari pada saudara-saudaranya; nama Yabes itu diberi ibunya kepadanya sebab katanya: Aku telah melahirkan dia dengan kesakitan.

4:9 And Jabez was held in more honor than his brothers; and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bore him with pain.

4:10 Yabes berseru kepada Allah Israel, katanya: Kiranya Engkau memberkati aku berlimpah-limpah dan 1amemperluas daerahku, dan kiranya tangan-Mu menyertai aku, dan melindungi aku dari pada malapetaka, sehingga kesakitan tidak menimpa aku! Dan Allah mengabulkan permintaannya itu.

4:10 And Jabez called on the God of Israel saying, Oh that You would richly bless me and 1a enlarge my border, and that Your hand would be with me, and that You would so keep me from evil that it would not grieve me! And God caused what he had requested to come to pass.

4:11 Kelub, saudara Suha, memperanakkan Mehir, dialah ayah Eston;

4:11 And Chelub the brother of Shuah begot Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.

4:12 dan Eston memperanakkan Bet-Rafa, Paseah dan Tehina, bapa Ir-Nahas. Itulah orang-orang Rekha.

4:12 And Eshton begot Bethrapha and Paseah and Tehinnah the father of Ir-nahash; these were the men of Recah.

4:13 Anak-anak Kenas ialah aOtniel dan Seraya; dan anak-anak Otniel ialah Hatat dan Meonotai;

4:13 And the sons of Kenaz: a Othniel and Seraiah; and the 1 son of Othniel: Hathath.

4:14 dan Meonotai memperanakkan Ofra. Seraya memperanakkan Yoab, bapa Lembah Tukang-tukang, karena mereka adalah tukang-tukang.

4:14 And Meonothai begot Ophrah; and Seraiah begot Joab the father of 1 Geharashim, for they were craftsmen.

4:15 Anak-anak Kaleb bin Yefune ialah Iru, Ela dan Naam; dan keturunan Ela ialah Kenas.

4:15 And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam; and the 1 son of Elah: 2 Kenaz.

4:16 Anak-anak Yehaleleel ialah Zif, Zifa, Tireya dan Asareel.

4:16 And the sons of Jehallelel: Ziph and Ziphah, Tiria and Asareel.

4:17 Anak-anak Ezra ialah Yeter, Mered, Efer dan Yalon. Itulah anak-anak Bica, puteri Firaun yang telah dikawini Mered. Perempuan ini melahirkan Miryam, Samai dan Yisbah, bapa Estemoa.

4:17 And the 1 sons of Ezrah: Jether and Mered and Epher and Jalon; and she conceived and bore Miriam and Shammai and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.

4:18 Isteri Mered, perempuan Yehuda itu, melahirkan Yered, bapa Gedor, dan Heber, bapa Sokho, dan Yekutiel, bapa Zanoah.

4:18 And his Judahite wife bore Jered the father of Gedor and Heber the father of Soco and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered took.

4:19 Anak-anak isteri Hodia, saudara perempuan Naham, ialah Abu Kehila, orang Garmi itu, dan Estemoa, orang Maakha itu.

4:19 And the sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham: the father of Keilah the Garmite and Eshtemoa the Maacathite.

4:20 Anak-anak Simon ialah Amnon, Rina, Benhanan dan Tilon. Anak-anak Yisei ialah Zohet dan Ben-Zohet.

4:20 And the sons of Shimon: Amnon and Rinnah, Ben-hanan and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi: Zoheth and Ben-zoheth.

4:21 Keturunan aSela, anak Yehuda, ialah Er, bapa Lekha, dan Lada, bapa Maresa, dan kaum-kaum para pengusaha kain lenan halus di Bet-Asybea,

4:21 The sons of a Shelah the son of Judah: Er the father of Lecah and Laadah the father of Mareshah and the families of the house of those who worked with fine linen at Beth-ashbea

4:22 lalu Yokim dan orang-orang Kozeba, lagi Yoas dan Saraf yang menguasai Moab dan kemudian pulang ke Betlehem; - riwayat-riwayat ini tua.

4:22 And Jokim and the men of Cozeba and Joash and Saraph, who ruled over Moab, and Jashubi-lehem. (But the records are ancient.)

4:23 Mereka ini adalah tukang-tukang periuk yang diam di Netaim dan Gedera; mereka diam di sana dan bekerja untuk raja.

4:23 These were the potters and the inhabitants of Netaim and Gedarah; they dwelt there with the king for his work.

 

 

3. Silsilah Simeon

3. The genealogy of Simeon

4:24-43

4:24-43

 

 

4:24 Anak-anak aSimeon ialah Nemuel, Yamin, Yarib, Zerah dan Saul;

4:24 The sons of a Simeon: Nemuel and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Shaul;

4:25 anak orang ini ialah Salum; anak orang ini ialah Mibsam; anak orang ini ialah Misma.

4:25 Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.

4:26 Keturunan Misma ialah Hamuel, anaknya; anak orang ini ialah Zakur; anak orang ini ialah Simei.

4:26 And the sons of Mishma: Hammuel his son, Zaccur his son, Shimei his son;

4:27 Simei mempunyai enam belas orang anak laki-laki dan enam orang anak perempuan; tetapi saudara-saudaranya tidak mempunyai banyak anak; seluruh kaum mereka tidak bertambah banyak seperti bani Yehuda.

4:27 And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters, but his brothers did not have many sons; neither did all their family multiply like the sons of Judah.

4:28 aMereka diam di Bersyeba, Molada, Hazar-Sual,

4:28 a And they dwelt at Beer-sheba and Moladah and Hazar-shual,

4:29 Bilha, Ezem, Tolad,

4:29 And at Bilhah and at Ezem and at Tolad

4:30 Betuel, Horma, Ziklag,

4:30 And at Bethuel and at Hormah and at Ziklag

4:31 Bet-Markabot, Hazar-Susim, Bet-Biri dan di Saaraim. Itulah kota-kota mereka sampai Daud menjadi raja.

4:31 And at Beth-marcaboth and at Hazar-susim and at Beth-biri and at Shaaraim. These were their cities until the reign of David.

4:32 Dan desa-desanya ialah Etam, Ain, Rimon, Tokhen dan Asan, lima perkampungan;

4:32 And their villages were Etam and Ain, Rimmon and Tochen and Ashan, five cities;

4:33 juga segala desanya yang di sekitar perkampungan-perkampungan itu sampai ke Baal. Itulah tempat-tempat kediaman mereka dan mereka mempunyai silsilahnya sendiri.

4:33 As well as all their villages which were around these cities, as far as Baal. These were their dwelling places and their genealogical enrollment.

4:34 Dan Mesobab, Yamlekh, Yosa bin Amazia,

4:34 And Meshobab and Jamlech and Joshah the son of Amaziah

4:35 YoEl, Yehu bin Yosibya bin Seraya bin Asiel,

4:35 And Joel and Jehu the son of Joshibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,

4:36 ElyoEnai, Yaakoba, Yesohaya, Asaya, Adiel, Yesimiel, Benaya,

4:36 And Elioenai and Jaakobah and Jeshohaiah and Asaiah and Adiel and Jesimiel and Benaiah

4:37 Ziza bin Sifei bin Alon bin Yedaya bin Simri bin Semaya -

4:37 And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah

4:38 orang-orang ini yang disebutkan dengan nama-namanya adalah pemimpin-pemimpin di antara kaum-kaum mereka. Keluarga-keluarga mereka makin bertambah banyak.

4:38 These mentioned by name were leaders in their families; and their fathers houses increased greatly.

4:39 Oleh sebab itu mereka pindah ke arah Gedor sampai ke sebelah timur lembah untuk mencari padang rumput bagi kambing domba mereka.

4:39 And they went to the entrance of Gedor, as far as the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.

4:40 Mereka menemui padang rumput yang 1gemuk dan baik; negeri itu luas, aman dan sentosa; orang-orang yang diam di sana sebelum mereka berasal dari Ham.

4:40 And they found 1 rich and good pasture and a spacious and quiet and peaceful land, for they who had formerly dwelt there were of Ham.

4:41 Orang-orang yang namanya tertulis ini datang dalam zaman aHizkia, raja Yehuda, dan memusnahkan kemah-kemah orang Ham dan orang Meunim yang terdapat di sana dan menumpas mereka; demikianlah sampai hari ini. Kemudian mereka menduduki tempat orang-orang itu, sebab di sana ada padang rumput bagi kambing domba mereka.

4:41 And these written by name came in the days of a Hezekiah the king of Judah, and struck their tents and the Meunim who were found there, and destroyed them utterly, as they are to this day; and they have dwelt in place of them; for there was pasture there for their flocks.

4:42 Dan sebagian dari mereka, dari bani Simeon, sebanyak lima ratus orang, pindah ke pegunungan Seir. Sebagai kepala mereka ialah Pelaca, Nearya, Refaya dan Uziel, anak-anak Yisei.

4:42 And some of them from among the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to Mount Seir, having at their head Pelatiah and Neariah and Rephaiah and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi;

4:43 Mereka membinasakan sisa aorang Amalek yang telah meluputkan diri. Lalu mereka diam di sana sampai hari ini.

4:43 And they struck down the rest of the a Amalekites who had escaped; and they have dwelt there to this day.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 5

1 CHRONICLES 5

 

 

4. Silsilah Ruben

4. The genealogy of Reuben

5:1-10

5:1-10

5:1 Anak-anak 1aRuben, anak sulung Israel. Dialah anak sulung, tetapi karena ia telah melanggar kesucian petiduran ayahnya, maka hak kesulungannya diberikan kepada keturunan dari bYusuf, anak Israel juga, sekalipun tidak tercatat dalam silsilah sebagai anak sulung.

5:1 And the sons of 1a Reuben the firstborn of Israel (for he was the firstborn; but because he defiled his fathers bed, his birthright was given to the sons of b Joseph the son of Israel; but he was not to be enrolled in the genealogy according to the birthright,

5:2 Memang aYehudalah yang melebihi saudara-saudaranya, bahkan salah seorang bdari antaranya menjadi raja, tetapi hak sulung itu ada pada Yusuf.

5:2 For a Judah prevailed among his brothers, and b from him was the leader, but the birthright was Josephs)

5:3 Anak-anak Ruben, anak sulung Israel, ialah aHenokh, Palu, Hezron dan Karmi.

5:3 The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel: a Hanoch and Pallu, Hezron and Carmi.

5:4 Keturunan YoEl ialah Semaya, anaknya; anak orang ini ialah Gog, anak orang ini ialah Simei;

5:4 The sons of Joel: Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,

5:5 anak orang ini ialah Mikha; anak orang ini ialah Reaya; anak orang ini ialah Baal;

5:5 Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,

5:6 anak orang ini ialah Beera yang diangkut ke dalam pembuangan oleh aTilgat-Pilneser, raja Asyur; dialah pemimpin orang Ruben.

5:6 Beerah his son, whom a Tilgath-pilneser the king of Assyria carried away captive; he was the leader of the Reubenites.

5:7 Saudara-saudaranya menurut kaum-kaumnya, seperti tercatat dalam silsilah menurut keturunan mereka, ialah Yeiel, kepala, lalu Zakharia,

5:7 And his brothers by their families, in the genealogical enrollment of their generations, were: Jeiel the chief and Zechariah

5:8 dan Bela bin Azas bin Sema bin YoEl; dialah yang diam di AroEr dan wilayahnya sampai ke Nebo dan Baal-Meon.

5:8 And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, as far as Nebo and Baal-meon;

5:9 Dan ke sebelah timur wilayahnya sampai ke pinggir padang gurun yang terbentang mulai dari sungai Efrat, sebab ternak mereka telah bertambah banyak di tanah Gilead.

5:9 And he dwelt on the east as far as the entrance to the wilderness from the river Euphrates; for their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.

5:10 Di zaman Saul mereka melakukan perang melawan aorang Hagri; setelah orang-orang ini jatuh ke dalam tangan mereka, maka mereka diam di kemah-kemah orang-orang itu di seluruh sisi timur Gilead.

5:10 And in the days of Saul they waged war with the a Hagarites, who fell by their hand; and they dwelt in their tents throughout the east side of Gilead.

 

 

 

 

 

 

5. Silsilah Gad

5. The genealogy of Gad

5:11-17

5:11-17

5:11 Bani Gad diam berbatasan dengan mereka di tanah Basan sampai Salkha.

5:11 And the children of Gad dwelt opposite them in the land of Bashan as far as Salecah.

5:12 YoEl adalah kepala dan Safam orang kedua; juga Yaenai dan Safat diam di Basan.

5:12 Joel was the head and Shapham the next, then Jaanai, and Shaphat in Bashan.

5:13 Saudara-saudara mereka menurut puak-puak mereka ialah Mikhael, Mesulam, Syeba, Yorai, Yakan, Ziya dan Eber, tujuh orang.

5:13 And their brothers according to their fathers houses were Michael and Meshullam and Sheba and Jorai and Jacan and Zia and Eber, seven.

5:14 Itulah anak-anak Abihail bin Huri bin Yaroah bin Gilead bin Mikhael bin Yesisai bin Yahdo bin Bus.

5:14 These were the sons of Abihail, the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz:

5:15 Ahi bin Abdiel bin Guni ialah salah seorang kepala puak mereka.

5:15 Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, was the head of their fathers house.

5:16 Mereka diam di Gilead, di Basan, dan di segala anak kotanya dan di segala tanah penggembalaan Saron sampai ke ujung-ujungnya.

5:16 And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan and in its towns and in all the pasture lands of Sharon as far as their limits.

5:17 Mereka sekalian dicatat dalam silsilah pada zaman aYotam, raja Yehuda, dan pada zaman bYerobeam, raja Israel.

5:17 All these were enrolled in genealogies in the days of a Jotham the king of Judah and in the days of b Jeroboam the king of Israel.

 

 

6. Sisipan mengenai Keturunan Ruben, Orang-orang Gad, dan Setengah Suku Manasye

6. An insertion concerning the children of Reuben, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh

5:18-26

5:18-26

 

 

5:18 Dari bani Ruben, orang Gad dan setengah suku Manasye ada empat puluh empat ribu tujuh ratus enam puluh orang yang sanggup berperang, orang-orang yang tangkas, yang dapat memanggul perisai dan pedang dan melentur busur panah, yang terlatih dalam bertempur.

5:18 The children of Reuben and the Gadites and half the tribe of Manasseh were among the valiant men, men who carried shield and sword, and drew the bow and were skillful in warforty-four thousand seven hundred sixty ready for war.

5:19 Mereka itu melakukan perang melawan aorang Hagri, Yetur, Nafish dan Nodab.

5:19 And they waged war with the a Hagarites and Jetur and Naphish and Nodab;

5:20 Mereka mendapat bantuan melawan orang-orang itu, sehingga orang Hagri itu dengan semua orang yang mengikutinya menyerahkan diri ke dalam tangan mereka, sebab mereka telah 1berseru kepada Allah dalam pertempuran itu. Maka Ia mengabulkan permintaan mereka, sebab mereka percaya kepada-Nya.

5:20 And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, as well as all who were with them; for they 1 cried out to God in the battle, and He was entreated for them because they trusted in Him.

5:21 Mereka mengangkut ternak orang-orang itu sebagai jarahan: untanya lima puluh ribu ekor, kambing domba dua ratus lima puluh ribu ekor dan keledai dua ribu ekor, juga manusia seratus ribu jiwa.

5:21 And they took their livestock: their fifty thousand camels, and two hundred fifty thousand sheep, and two thousand donkeys, as well as one hundred thousand people.

5:22 Banyak orang yang tewas karena mati terbunuh, sebab pertempuran itu adalah dari pada Allah. Lalu mereka menduduki tempat orang-orang itu sampai waktu apembuangan.

5:22 For many fell down slain, for the war was of God. And they dwelt in their place until the a captivity.

5:23 Setengah suku Manasye diam di negeri itu mulai dari Basan sampai Baal-Hermon, Senir dan gunung Hermon. Mereka sudah banyak jumlahnya.

5:23 And the children of the half-tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land, from Bashan as far as Baal-hermon and Senir and Mount Hermon; they were many.

5:24 Inilah para kepala puak-puak mereka: Hefer, Yisei, Eliel, Azriel, Yeremia, Hodawya dan Yahdiel, orang-orang pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, orang-orang yang kenamaan, para kepala puak-puak mereka.

5:24 And these were the heads of their fathers houses: Epher and Ishi and Eliel and Azriel and Jeremiah and Hodaviah and Jahdiel, mighty men of valor, famous men, heads of their fathers houses.

5:25 Tetapi ketika mereka berubah setia terhadap Allah nenek moyang mereka dan berzina dengan mengikuti segala allah bangsa-bangsa negeri yang telah dimusnahkan Allah dari depan mereka,

5:25 But they trespassed against the God of their fathers, and went as harlots after the gods of the peoples of the land, whom God had destroyed before them.

5:26 maka Allah Israel amenggerakkan hati bPul, yakni Tilgat-Pilneser, raja Asyur, lalu raja itu mengangkut mereka ke dalam pembuangan, yaitu orang Ruben, orang Gad dan setengah suku Manasye. Ia membawa mereka ke cHalah, Habor, Hara dan sungai negeri Gozan; demikianlah mereka ada di sana sampai hari ini.

5:26 And the God of Israel a stirred up the spirit of b Pul the king of Assyria and the spirit of Tilgath-pilneser the king of Assyria; and He carried them away, the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh, and brought them to c Halah and Habor and Hara and to the river Gozan, where they are to this day.
