6:62 And to the children of a Gershom, according to their families, out of the tribe of Issachar and out of the tribe of Asher and out of the tribe of Naphtali and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.

6:63 Kepada keturunan aMerari menurut kaum-kaum mereka diberikan dengan diundi dua belas kota dari suku Ruben, dari suku Gad dan dari suku Zebulon.

6:63 To the children of a Merari were given by lot, according to their families, out of the tribe of Reuben and out of the tribe of Gad and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.

6:64 Jadi orang Israel memberikan kepada orang Lewi kota-kota itu dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

6:64 And the children of Israel gave the cities and their pasture lands to the Levites.

6:65 Mereka memberikan juga dengan diundi kota-kota tadi, yang mereka sebutkan nama-namanya, dari suku bani Yehuda, dari suku bani Simeon dan dari suku bani Benyamin.

6:65 And they gave by lot those cities which were mentioned by name out of the tribe of the children of Judah and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin.

6:66 aKaum-kaum yang lain dari keturunan Kehat mendapat kota-kota dari suku Efraim sebagai daerah mereka.

6:66 a And some of the families of the children of Kohath had cities of their territory from the tribe of Ephraim.

6:67 Kepada mereka diberikan Sikhem, kota perlindungan itu, dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, di pegunungan Efraim, lalu Gezer dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

6:67 And they gave them the city of refuge Shechem and its pasture lands in the hill country of Ephraim, and Gezer and its pasture lands,

6:68 Yokmeam dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Bet-Horon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

6:68 And Jokmeam and its pasture lands, and Beth-horon and its pasture lands,

6:69 Ayalon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Gat-Rimon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

6:69 And Aijalon and its pasture lands, and Gath-rimmon and its pasture lands;

6:70 Dan dari suku Manasye yang setengah itu: Aner dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Bileam dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya. Jadi kota-kota itu diberikan kepada kaum-kaum yang selebihnya dari keturunan Kehat.

6:70 And out of the half-tribe of Manasseh: Aner and its pasture lands, and Bileam and its pasture lands, for the rest of the families of the children of Kohath.

6:71 aKeturunan Gerson mendapat dari kaum suku Manasye yang setengah itu; Golan yang di Basan dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, lalu Asytarot dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

6:71 a To the children of Gershom were given out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan and its pasture lands, and Ashtaroth and its pasture lands;

6:72 dari suku Isakhar: Kedesh dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya; Daberat dengan tanah-tanah pengembalaannya,

6:72 And out of the tribe of Issachar: Kedesh and its pasture lands, Daberath and its pasture lands,

6:73 Ramot dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Anem dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

6:73 And Ramoth and its pasture lands, and Anem and its pasture lands;

6:74 dari suku Asyer: Masal dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Abdon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

6:74 And out of the tribe of Asher: Mashal and its pasture lands, and Abdon and its pasture lands,

6:75 Hukok dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Rehob dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

6:75 And Hukok and its pasture lands, and Rehob and its pasture lands;

6:76 dari suku Naftali: Kedesh yang di Galilea dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Hamon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Kiryataim dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

6:76 And out of the tribe of Naphtali: Kedesh in Galilee and its pasture lands, and Hammon and its pasture lands, and Kiriathaim and its pasture lands.

6:77 Keturunan Merari yang aselebihnya mendapat dari suku Zebulon: Rimono dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Tabor dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

6:77 a To the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun: Rimmono and its pasture lands, and Tabor and its pasture lands;

6:78 dan di seberang sungai Yordan dekat Yerikho, di sebelah timur sungai Yordan, diberikan dari suku Ruben: Bezer yang di padang gurun dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Yahas dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

6:78 And on the other side of the Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, out of the tribe of Reuben: Bezer in the wilderness and its pasture lands, and Jahzah and its pasture lands,

6:79 Kedemot dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Mefaat dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

6:79 And Kedemoth and its pasture lands, and Mephaath and its pasture lands;

6:80 dan dari suku Gad: Ramot di Gilead dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Mahanaim dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

6:80 And out of the tribe of Gad: Ramoth in Gilead and its pasture lands, and Mahanaim and its pasture lands,

6:81 Hesybon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Yaezer dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

6:81 And Heshbon and its pasture lands, and Jazer and its pasture lands.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 7

1 CHRONICLES 7

 

 

8. Silsilah Isakhar

8. The genealogy of Issachar

7:1-5

7:1-5

 

 

7:1 aAnak-anak Isakhar ialah Tola dan Pua, Yasub dan Simron, empat orang.

7:1 a And the sons of Issachar were Tola and Puah, Jashub and Shimron, four.

7:2 Anak-anak Tola ialah Uzi, Refaya, Yeriel, Yahmai, Yibsam dan Samuel, kepala-kepala puak turunan Tola, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa; menurut daftar keturunan mereka ajumlahnya di zaman Daud ada dua puluh dua ribu enam ratus orang.

7:2 And the sons of Tola: Uzzi and Rephaiah and Jeriel and Jahmai and Ibsam and Shemuel, the heads of their fathers houses. The sons of Tola were mighty men of valor in their generations; their a number in the days of David was twenty-two thousand six hundred.

7:3 Keturunan Uzi ialah Yizrahya dan anak-anak Yizrahya ialah Mikhael, Obaja, YoEl dan Yisia, lima orang, semuanya mereka adalah kepala-kepala.

7:3 And the sons of Uzzi: Izrahiah; and the sons of Izrahiah: Michael and Obadiah and Joel and Isshiah; all five of them were chief men.

7:4 Di bawah mereka itu, menurut daftar keturunan dan menurut puak mereka, ada pasukan-pasukan tentara tiga puluh enam ribu orang, sebab isteri dan anak-anak mereka banyak.

7:4 And with them by their generations, according to their fathers houses, were bands for war, thirty-six thousand; for they had many wives and sons.

7:5 Saudara-saudara sesuku mereka dari segala kaum Isakhar, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, semuanya ada delapan puluh tujuh ribu orang yang terdaftar dalam silsilah.

7:5 And their brothers among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of valor, enrolled by genealogy, in all eighty-seven thousand.

 

 

9. Silsilah Benyamin

9. The genealogy of Benjamin

7:6-12; 8:1-40

7:6-12; 8:1-40

 

 

7:6 aAnak-anak Benyamin ialah Bela, Bekher dan Yediael, tiga orang.

7:6 a The sons of Benjamin: Bela and Becher and Jediael, three.

7:7 Anak-anak Bela ialah Ezbon, Uzi, Uziel, Yerimot dan Iri, lima orang, kepala-kepala puak, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa; mereka yang terdaftar dalam silsilah ada dua puluh dua ribu tiga puluh empat orang.

7:7 And the sons of Bela: Ezbon and Uzzi and Uzziel and Jerimoth and Iri, five; they were the heads of fathers houses, mighty men of valor, and were enrolled by genealogy, twenty-two thousand thirty-four.

7:8 Anak-anak Bekher ialah Zemira, Yoas, Eliezer, ElyoEnai, Omri, Yeremot, Abia, Anatot dan Alemet; sekaliannya itu ialah anak-anak Bekher.

7:8 And the sons of Becher: Zemirah and Joash and Eliezer and Elioenai and Omri and Jeremoth and Abijah and Anathoth and Alemeth; all these were the sons of Becher.

7:9 Mereka yang terdaftar dalam silsilah, menurut keturunan mereka, sebagai kepala-kepala puak mereka, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, ada dua puluh ribu dua ratus orang.

7:9 And they were enrolled by genealogy by their generations, the heads of their fathers houses, mighty men of valor, twenty thousand two hundred.

7:10 1Keturunan Yediael ialah Bilhan dan anak-anak Bilhan ialah Yeush, Benyamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zetan, Tarsis dan Ahisahar.

7:10 And the 1 son of Jediael: Bilhan; and the sons of Bilhan: Jeush and Benjamin and Ehud and Chenaanah and Zethan and Tarshish and Ahishahar.

7:11 Sekaliannya itu ialah keturunan Yediael, kepala-kepala puak mereka, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa; orang-orang yang sanggup berperang ada tujuh belas ribu dua ratus.

7:11 All these were the sons of Jediael, according to the heads of their fathers houses, mighty men of valor, seventeen thousand two hundred, ready for the service of war.

7:12 Dan Supim dan Hupim ialah keturunan Ir; Husim ialah keturunan Aher.

7:12 And Shuppim and Huppim, the children of Ir; Hushim, the son of Aher.

 

 

10. Silsilah Naftali

10. The genealogy of Naphtali

7:13

7:13

 

 

7:13 aAnak-anak Naftali ialah Yahziel, Guni, Yezer dan Salum, anak-anaknya dari Bilha.

7:13 a The sons of Naphtali: Jahziel and Guni and Jezer and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.

 

 

11. Silsilah Manasye

11. The genealogy of Manasseh

7:14-19

7:14-19

 

 

7:14 aKeturunan Manasye ialah Asriel yang dilahirkan oleh gundiknya, perempuan Aram itu; perempuan ini melahirkan Makhir, bapa Gilead.

7:14 a The sons of Manasseh: Asriel, whom his Syrian concubine bore; she bore Machir the father of Gilead.

7:15 Makhir mengambil seorang isteri bagi Hupim dan Supim; nama saudaranya perempuan ialah Maakha. Nama anak yang kedua ialah aZelafehad. Zelafehad hanya mempunyai anak-anak perempuan.

7:15 And Machir took a wife, the sister of Huppim and Shuppim; and the name of their sister was Maacah. And the name of the second son was a Zelophehad, and Zelophehad had daughters.

7:16 Tetapi Maakha, isteri Makhir, melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki dan menamainya Peresh; nama saudaranya laki-laki ialah Seres dan anak-anak orang ini ialah Ulam dan Rekem.

7:16 And Maacah the wife of Machir bore a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.

7:17 Keturunan Ulam ialah Bedan. Itulah keturunan Gilead bin Makhir bin Manasye.

7:17 And the son of Ulam: Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.

7:18 Saudaranya perempuan, Molekhet, melahirkan Isyhod, Abiezer dan Mahla.

7:18 And his sister Hammolecheth bore Ishhod and Abiezer and Mahlah.

7:19 Anak-anak Semida ialah Ahyan, Sekhem, Likhi dan Aniam.

7:19 And the sons of Shemidah were Ahian and Shechem and Likhi and Aniam.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

12. Silsilah Efraim

12. The genealogy of Ephraim

7:20-29

7:20-29

 

 

7:20 aKeturunan Efraim ialah Sutelah, dan anak orang ini ialah Bered, dan anak orang ini ialah Tahat, dan anak orang ini ialah Elada, dan anak orang ini ialah Tahat,

7:20 a And the sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah and Bered his son and Tahath his son and Eleadah his son and Tahath his son

7:21 dan anak orang ini ialah Zabad, dan anak orang ini ialah Sutelah, kemudian Ezer dan Elad. Mereka dibunuh oleh orang-orang Gat yang lahir di negeri itu, sebab mereka pergi merampas ternak orang-orang itu.

7:21 And Zabad his son and Shuthelah his son and Ezer and Elead. And the men of Gath who had been born in the land slew them, because they came down to take their cattle.

7:22 Efraim, ayah mereka, berkabung berhari-hari lamanya, sehingga saudara-saudaranya datang untuk menghiburkan dia.

7:22 And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brothers came to comfort him.

7:23 Sesudah itu ia bersetubuh dengan isterinya, lalu mengandunglah perempuan itu dan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki. Ia menamainya 1Beria, sebab malapetaka telah menimpa keluarganya.

7:23 And he went in to his wife, and she conceived and bore a son; and he called his name 1 Beriah, for it was when misfortune was in his house.

7:24 Anaknya perempuan ialah Seera yang telah mendirikan Bet-Horon-Hilir dan Bet-Horon-Hulu serta Uzen-Seera.

7:24 And his daughter was Sheerah; and she built lower and upper Beth-horon and Uzzen-sheerah.

7:25 Anak laki-laki Beria ialah Refah, lalu Resef; anak orang ini ialah Telah, dan anak orang ini ialah Tahan,

7:25 And Rephah was his son, as well as Resheph and Telah his son and Tahan his son,

7:26 dan anak orang ini ialah Ladan, dan anak orang ini ialah Amihud, dan anak orang ini ialah Elisama,

7:26 Ladan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,

7:27 dan anak orang ini ialah Nun, dan anak orang ini ialah aYosua.

7:27 Nun his son, a Joshua his son.

7:28 Tanah milik mereka dan tempat kediaman mereka ialah Betel dengan segala anak kotanya, Naaran di sebelah timur dan Gezer dengan segala anak kotanya di sebelah barat, kemudian Sikhem dengan segala anak kotanya sampai 1Aya dengan segala anak kotanya,

7:28 And their possession and dwelling places were Bethel and its villages, and Naaran to the east, and Gezer to the west and its villages, and Shechem and its villages as far as to 1 Ayyah and its villages.

 

 

7:29 dan pada perbatasan bani Manasye: Bet-Sean dengan segala anak kotanya, juga Taanakh dengan segala anak kotanya, Megido dengan segala anak kotanya, Dor dengan segala anak kotanya. Di tempat-tempat itulah keturunan Yusuf bin Israel diam.

7:29 And 1 in the hands of the children of Manasseh were Beth-shean and its villages, Taanach and its villages, Megiddo and its villages, Dor and its villages. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.

 

 

13. Silsilah Asyer

13. The genealogy of Asher

7:30-40

7:30-40

 

 

7:30 aAnak-anak Asyer ialah Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi dan Beria; Serah ialah saudara perempuan mereka.

7:30 a The sons of Asher: Imnah and Ishvah and Ishvi and Beriah; and Serah was their sister.

7:31 Anak-anak Beria ialah Heber dan Malkiel; dialah bapa Birzait.

7:31 And the sons of Beriah: Heber and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzaith.

7:32 Heber memperanakkan Yaflet, Somer dan Hotam serta Sua, saudara perempuan mereka.

7:32 And Heber begot Japhlet and Shomer and Hotham and Shua their sister.

7:33 Anak-anak Yaflet ialah Pasakh, Bimhab dan Asywat. Itulah anak-anak Yaflet.

7:33 And the sons of Japhlet: Pasach and Bimhal and Ashvath; these are the sons of Japhlet.

7:34 Anak-anak 1Semer ialah Ahi, Rohga, Yehuba dan Aram.

7:34 And the sons of 1 Shemer: Ahi and Rohgah and Jehubbah and Aram.

7:35 Anak-anak Helem, saudaranya laki-laki, ialah Zofah, Yimna, Seles dan Amal.

7:35 And the sons of his brother Helem: Zophah and Imna and Shelesh and Amal.

7:36 Anak-anak Zofah ialah Suah, Harnefer, Syual, Beri dan Yimra,

7:36 The 1 sons of Zophah: Suah and Harnepher and Shual and Beri and Imrah,

7:37 Bezer, Hod, Sama, Silsa, Yitran dan Beera.

7:37 Bezer and Hod and Shamma and Shilshah and Ithran, and Beera.

7:38 Anak-anak Yeter ialah Yefune, Pispa dan Ara.

7:38 And the sons of Jether: Jephunneh and Pispah and Ara.

7:39 Anak-anak Ula ialah Arah, Haniel dan Rizya.

7:39 And the sons of Ulla: Arah and Hanniel and Rizia.

7:40 Itulah sekaliannya keturunan Asyer, kepala-kepala puak mereka, pahlawan-pahlawan gagah perkasa yang terpilih, pemimpin-pemimpin utama. Jumlah yang terdaftar dalam silsilah mereka sebagai pasukan perang ada dua puluh enam ribu orang.

7:40 All these were the sons of Asher, the heads of fathers houses, choice and mighty men of valor, chiefs of the princes. And the number of them enrolled by genealogy for the service in war was twenty-six thousand men.

1 TAWARIKH 8

1 CHRONICLES 8

 

 

9. Silsilah Benyamin (Lanjutan)

9. The genealogy of Benjamin (cont'd)

8:1-40

8:1-40

 

 

8:1 aBenyamin memperanakkan Bela, anak sulungnya, Asybel, anak yang kedua, Ahrah, anak yang ketiga,

8:1 a And Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

8:2 Noha, anak yang keempat dan Rafa, anak yang kelima.

8:2 Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

8:3 Anak-anak Bela ialah Adar, Gera, Abihud,

8:3 And Bela had sons: Addar and Gera and Abihud

8:4 Abisua, Naaman, Ahoah,

8:4 And Abishua and Naaman and Ahoah

8:5 Gera, Sefufan dan Huram.

8:5 And Gera and Shephuphan and Huram.

8:6 Inilah anak-anak aEhud; mereka ini adalah kepala-kepala puak penduduk Geba yang diangkut ke dalam pembuangan ke Manahat;

8:6 And these are the sons of a Ehud (these were the heads of fathers houses of the inhabitants of Geba; and they carried them away to Manahath,

8:7 Naaman, Ahia dan Gera mengangkut mereka ke dalam pembuangan; dia memperanakkan Uza dan Ahihud.

8:7 Namely, Naaman and Ahijah and Gera; he carried them into exile); and he begot Uzza and Ahihud.

8:8 Saharaim mendapat anak di daerah Moab, sesudah diusirnya Husim dan Baara, isteri-isterinya.

8:8 And Shaharaim begot children in the field of Moab after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.

8:9 Ia mendapat anak dari Hodesh, isterinya, yakni Yobab, Zibya, Mesa, Malkam,

8:9 And he begot by Hodesh his wife: Jobab and Zibia and Mesha and Malcham

8:10 Yeus, Sokhya dan Mirma; itulah anak-anaknya, kepala-kepala puak;

8:10 And Jeuz and Sachia and Mirmah; these were his sons, the heads of fathers houses.

8:11 sebelum itu dari Husim ia telah mendapat anak, yakni Abitub dan Elpaal.

8:11 And by Hushim he begot Abitub and Elpaal.

8:12 Anak-anak Elpaal ialah Eber, Misam dan Semed; dia ini mendirikan kota Ono dan kota Lod dengan segala anak kotanya.

8:12 And the sons of Elpaal: Eber and Misham and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod and its villages;

8:13 Beria dan Sema adalah kepala-kepala puak penduduk Ayalon; mereka telah menghalau penduduk Gat.

8:13 And Beriah and Shema, who were heads of fathers houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon; they drove away the inhabitants of Gath.

8:14 Ahyo, Sasak, Yeremot,

8:14 And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

8:15 Zebaja, Arad, Eder,

8:15 And Zebadiah and Arad and Eder

8:16 Mikhael, Yispa dan Yoha ialah anak-anak Beria.

8:16 And Michael and Ishpah and Joha were the sons of Beriah.

8:17 Zebaja, Mesulam, Hizki, Heber,

8:17 And Zebadiah and Meshullam and Hizki and Heber

8:18 Yismerai, Yizlia dan Yobab ialah anak-anak Elpaal.

8:18 And Ishmerai and Izliah and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.

8:19 Yakim, Zikhri, Zabdi,

8:19 And Jakim and Zichri and Zabdi

8:20 ElyoEnai, Ziletai, Eliel,

8:20 And Elienai and Zillethai and Eliel

8:21 Adaya, Beraya dan Simrat ialah anak-anak Simei.

8:21 And Adaiah and Beraiah and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.

8:22 Yispan, Eber, Eliel,

8:22 And Ishpan and Eber and Eliel

8:23 Abdon, Zikhri, Hanan,

8:23 And Abdon and Zichri and Hanan

8:24 Hananya, Elam, Antotia,

8:24 And Hananiah and Elam and Anthothijah

8:25 Yifdeya dan Pnuel ialah anak-anak Sasak.

8:25 And Iphdeiah and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.

8:26 Samserai, Seharya, Atalya,

8:26 And Shamsherai and Shehariah and Athaliah

8:27 Yaaresya, Elia dan Zikhri ialah anak-anak Yeroham.

8:27 And Jaareshiah and Elijah and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.

8:28 Itulah para kepala puak, para kepala menurut keturunan mereka; mereka ini diam di Yerusalem.

8:28 These were heads of fathers houses, according to their generations, chief men; these dwelt in Jerusalem.

8:29 aTetapi di Gibeon diam bapa Gibeon, yakni Yeiel, dan nama isterinya ialah Maakha.

8:29 a And in Gibeon there dwelt the father of Gibeon, and his wifes name was Maacah;

8:30 Anak sulungnya ialah Abdon, lalu Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,

8:30 And his firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur and Kish and Baal and Nadab

8:31 Gedor, Ahyo, Zekher1

8:31 And Gedor and Ahio and Zecher 1 and Mikloth.

8:32 dan Miklot yang memperanakkan Simea. Juga mereka ini pergi diam berdekatan dengan saudara-saudara mereka di Yerusalem bersama-sama saudara mereka yang lain.

8:32 And Mikloth begot Shimeah. And these also dwelt opposite their brothers in Jerusalem, with their brothers.

8:33 Ner memperanakkan Kish; aKish memperanakkan Saul; bSaul memperanakkan Yonatan, Malkisua, Abinadab dan Esybaal.

8:33 And Ner begot Kish; and a Kish begot Saul; and b Saul begot Jonathan and Malchishua and Abinadab and Esh-baal.

8:34 Anak aYonatan ialah Meribaal dan bMeribaal memperanakkan Mikha.

8:34 And the son of a Jonathan was Merib-baal; and b Merib-baal begot Micah.

8:35 Anak Mikha ialah Piton, Melekh, Tarea dan Ahas.

8:35 And the sons of Micah: Pithon and Melech and Tarea and Ahaz.

8:36 Ahas memperanakkan Yoada; Yoada memperanakkan Alemet, Azmawet dan Zimri; Zimri memperanakkan Moza.

8:36 And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah begot Alemeth and Azmaveth and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;

8:37 Moza memperanakkan Bina; anak orang ini ialah Rafa, dan anak orang ini ialah Elasa, dan anak orang ini ialah Azel.

8:37 And Moza begot Binea; Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

8:38 Azel mempunyai enam orang anak, dan inilah nama-nama mereka: Azrikam, Bokhru, Ismael, Searya, Obaja dan Hanan. Itulah sekaliannya anak-anak Azel.

8:38 And Azel had six sons, and these were their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael and Sheariah and Obadiah and Hanan; all these were the sons of Azel.

8:39 Anak-anak Esek, saudaranya, ialah Ulam, anak sulungnya, lalu Yeush, anak yang kedua, dan Elifelet, anak yang ketiga.

8:39 And the sons of Eshek his brother were Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

8:40 Anak-anak Ulam itu adalah orang-orang berani, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, pemanah-pemanah; anak dan cucu mereka banyak: seratus lima puluh orang. Mereka semuanya itu termasuk bani Benyamin.

8:40 And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers; and they had many children and grandchildren, one hundred fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 9

1 CHRONICLES 9

 

 

14. Silsilah Bani Israel yang Kembali dari Pembuangan

14. The genealogy of the returned children of Israel

9:1-34

9:1-34

 

 

9:1 Seluruh orang Israel telah terdaftar dalam silsilah; mereka tertulis dalam kitab raja-raja Israel, sedang orang aYehuda telah diangkut ke dalam pembuangan ke Babel oleh karena perbuatan mereka yang tidak setia.

9:1 So all Israel was enrolled by genealogy, and they are now written in the book of the kings of Israel; and a Judah was carried away captive to Babylon for their unfaithfulness.

9:2 aDan orang-orang yang mula-mula menetap kembali di tanah-tanah milik mereka, di bkota-kota mereka, ialah orang Israel awam, para imam, orang-orang Lewi dan para budak di bait Allah.

9:2 a Now the first ones to dwell in their possessions in their b cities were Israel, the priests, the Levites, and the temple servants.

9:3 Di Yerusalem tinggal orang-orang dari bani Yehuda, dari bani Benyamin, dari bani Efraim dan Manasye:

9:3 And some of the children of Judah and some of the children of Benjamin and some of the children of Ephraim and Manasseh dwelt in Jerusalem:

9:4 Utai bin Amihud bin Omri bin Imri bin Bani, dari keturunan Peres bin Yehuda.

9:4 Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Perez the son of Judah;

9:5 Dan dari orang Syela ialah Asaya, anak yang sulung, dengan anak-anaknya.

9:5 And of the Shilonites: Asaiah the first-born and his sons.

9:6 Dari keturunan Zerah ialah Yeuel dengan sanak saudaranya, enam ratus sembilan puluh orang.

9:6 And of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel and their brothers, six hundred ninety.

9:7 Dari bani Benyamin ialah Salu bin Mesulam bin Hodawya bin Hasenua,

9:7 And of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah;

9:8 Yibnea bin Yeroham, Ela bin Uzi bin Mikhri dan Mesulam bin Sefaca bin Rehuel bin Yibnia

9:8 And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham: and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri; and Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;

9:9 dengan sanak saudara mereka menurut keturunan mereka, sembilan ratus lima puluh enam orang. Semua orang itu adalah kepala puak.

9:9 And their brothers, according to their generations, nine hundred fifty-six; all these men were heads of fathers houses according to their fathers houses.

9:10 Dari para imam ialah Yedaya, Yoyarib, Yakhin,

9:10 And of the priests: Jedaiah and Jehoiarib and Jachin;

9:11 aAzarya bin Hilkia bin Mesulam bin Zadok bin Merayot bin Ahitub, pemuka rumah Allah,

9:11 a And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;

9:12 lalu Adaya bin Yeroham bin Pasyhur bin Malkia, dan Masai bin Adiel bin Yahzera bin Mesulam bin Mesilemit bin Imer,

9:12 And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashhur, the son of Malchijah; and Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;

9:13 dengan sanak saudara mereka, kepala-kepala puak, seribu tujuh ratus enam puluh orang, orang-orang tangkas untuk menyelenggarakan ibadah di rumah Allah.

9:13 And their brothers, heads of their fathers houses, one thousand seven hundred sixty able men for the work of the service of the house of God.

9:14 Dari orang-orang Lewi ialah Semaya bin Hasub bin Azrikam bin Hasabya, dari keturunan Merari;

9:14 And of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;

9:15 lalu Bakbakar, Heresh, Galal dan Matanya bin Mikha bin Zikhri bin Asaf,

9:15 And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal; and Mattaniah the son of Mica, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;

9:16 serta Obaja bin Semaya bin Galal bin Yedutun dan Berekhya bin Asa bin Elkana yang diam di desa-desa orang Netofa.

9:16 And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.

9:17 Penunggu-penunggu pintu gerbang ialah Salum, Akub, Talmon dan Ahiman, dengan sanak saudara mereka; Salum ialah kepala.

9:17 And the gatekeepers: Shallum and Akkub and Talmon and Ahiman and their brothers. Shallum was the chief,

9:18 Sampai sekarang mereka ada di pintu gerbang raja di sebelah timur. Merekalah penunggu-penunggu pintu gerbang perkemahan bani Lewi.

9:18 Being stationed until then at the kings gate on the east. These were the gatekeepers for the camps of the children of Levi.

9:19 Salum bin Kore bin Ebyasaf bin 1Korah dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya, yakni orang-orang aKorah, mempunyai tugas jabatan sebagai penjaga-penjaga ambang pintu Kemah, seperti bapa-bapa mereka bertugas di perkemahan Tuhan sebagai penjaga-penjaga pintu masuk.

9:19 And Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of 1 Korah, and his brothers of his fathers house, the a Korahites, were over the work of the service as keepers of the thresholds of the tent; and their fathers had been over the camp of Jehovah, keepers of the entrance.

9:20 aPinehas bin Eleazar mengepalai mereka sebelumnya. Tuhan kiranya menyertai dia.

9:20 And a Phinehas the son of Eleazar was ruler over them in time past; Jehovah was with him.

9:21 Zakharia bin Meselemya adalah penunggu pintu Kemah Pertemuan.

9:21 Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was gatekeeper of the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

9:22 Mereka semuanya yang terpilih menjadi penunggu ambang pintu ada dua ratus dua belas orang. Mereka telah terdaftar dalam silsilah di desa-desa mereka. Daud dan Samuel, pelihat itu, mengangkat mereka dalam jabatan itu.

9:22 All these who were chosen to be gatekeepers in the thresholds were two hundred twelve. These were enrolled by genealogy in their villages; David and Samuel the seer appointed them because of their faithfulness.

9:23 Mereka dan anak-anak mereka bertugas menjaga pintu-pintu gerbang rumah Tuhan, yakni Bait Kemah itu.

9:23 So they and their sons had charge of the gates of the house of Jehovah, the house of the tent, as guards.

9:24 Ke arah empat mata angin ditempatkan penunggu-penunggu pintu gerbang itu, yakni ke arah timur, barat, utara dan selatan.

9:24 On the four sides were the gatekeepers, toward the east, west, north, and south.

9:25 Dan saudara-saudara mereka yang tinggal di desa-desa mereka, pada waktu-waktu tertentu harus masuk selama tujuh hari untuk bekerja bersama-sama mereka,

9:25 And their brothers in their villages were to come in every seven days from time to time to be with them:

9:26 sedang keempat kepala penunggu pintu gerbang itu memegang jabatan tetap. Mereka adalah orang Lewi dan mengawasi bilik-bilik serta perbendaharaan rumah Allah.

9:26 For the four chief gatekeepers, who were Levites, were faithful and were over the chambers and over the treasuries in the house of God.

9:27 Mereka bermalam di sekitar rumah Allah itu sebab mereka bertanggung jawab atas penjagaan dan harus membuka pintu setiap pagi.

9:27 And they spent the night around the house of God because the charge of the watch was upon them; and they had charge of opening it morning by morning.

9:28 Sebagian dari mereka mengurus perkakas ibadah: mereka menghitung perkakas itu pada waktu dimasukkan dan dikeluarkan.

9:28 And some of them had charge of the vessels of service; for these were counted when they were brought in, and they were counted when they were taken out.

9:29 Sebagian dari mereka ditugaskan mengurus perabotan, yakni segala perabotan tempat kudus, dan mengurus tepung yang terbaik, anggur, minyak, kemenyan dan rempah-rempah,

9:29 And some of them also were appointed over the furniture, and over all the vessels of the sanctuary, and over the fine flour and the wine and the oil and the frankincense and the spices.

9:30 sedangkan beberapa orang imam menyediakan acampuran rempah-rempah.

9:30 And some of the sons of the priests prepared the a compounding of the spices.

9:31 Matica, salah seorang Lewi, anak sulung Salum, orang Korah itu, mendapat tugas tetap untuk mengolah roti.

9:31 And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, was entrusted with the things that were baked in pans.

9:32 Dan sebagian dari anak-anak orang Kehat, yakni dari sanak saudara mereka, mengurus aroti sajian untuk disediakan setiap hari Sabat.

9:32 And some of their brothers from the sons of the Kohathites were over the rows of a bread, to prepare them every Sabbath.

9:33 Dan inilah para penyanyi, kepala-kepala puak orang Lewi, yang diam di bilik-bilik dan bebas dari pekerjaan lain, sebab siang dan amalam mereka sibuk dengan pekerjaannya.

9:33 And these are the singers, heads of fathers houses of the Levites, who dwelt in the chambers and were free from other service, for they were employed in their work day and a night.

9:34 Itulah para kepala puak orang Lewi, para kepala, menurut keturunan mereka; mereka ini diam di Yerusalem.

9:34 These were heads of fathers houses of the Levites according to their generations, chief men; these dwelt at Jerusalem.

 

 

15. Silsilah Keluarga Saul

15. The genealogy of the house of Saul

9:35-44

9:35-44

9:35 aDi Gibeon diam bapa Gibeon, yakni Yeiel, dan nama isterinya ialah Maakha.

9:35 a And in Gibeon there dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, and his wifes name was Maacah;

9:36 Anak sulungnya ialah Abdon, lalu Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,

9:36 And his firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur and Kish and Baal and Ner and Nadab

9:37 Gedor, Ahyo, Zakharia dan Miklot.

9:37 And Gedor and Ahio and Zechariah and Mikloth.

9:38 Miklot memperanakkan Simeam. Juga mereka ini pergi diam berdekatan dengan saudara-saudara mereka di Yerusalem bersama-sama saudara mereka yang lain.

9:38 And Mikloth begot Shimeam. And these also dwelt opposite their brothers in Jerusalem, with their brothers.

9:39 Ner memperanakkan Kish; Kish memperanakkan Saul; Saul memperanakkan Yonatan, Malkisua, Abinadab dan Esybaal.

9:39 And Ner begot Kish; and Kish begot Saul; and Saul begot Jonathan and Malchishua and Abinadab and Esh-baal.

9:40 Anak Yonatan ialah Meribaal, dan Meribaal memperanakkan Mikha.

9:40 And the son of Jonathan was Merib-baal; and Merib-baal begot Micah.

9:41 Anak Mikha ialah Piton, Melekh, Tahrea 1dan Ahas.

9:41 And the sons of Micah: Pithon and Melech and Tahrea 1 and Ahaz.

9:42 Ahas memperanakkan Yaera; Yaera memperanakkan Alemet, Azmawet dan Zimri; Zimri memperanakkan Moza.

9:42 And Ahaz begot Jarah; and Jarah begot Alemeth and Azmaveth and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;

9:43 Moza memperanakkan Bina, dan anak orang ini ialah Refaya, dan anak orang ini ialah Elasa, dan anak orang ini ialah Azel.

9:43 And Moza begot Binea; and Rephaiah was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

9:44 Azel mempunyai enam orang anak dan inilah nama-nama mereka: Azrikam, Bokhru, Ismael, Searya, Obaja dan Hanan. Itulah anak-anak Azel.

9:44 And Azel had six sons, and these were their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael and Sheariah and Obadiah and Hanan; these were the sons of Azel.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 10

1 CHRONICLES 10

 

 

II. Sejarah mengenai Raja-raja atas Seluruh Israel

II. The history concerning the kings over all Israel

1 Taw. 10:1-2 Taw. 9:31a

1 Chron. 10:1-2 Chron. 9:31a

A. Akhir Hidup Saul

A. Saul's end

10:1-14

10:1-14

 

 

10:1 1aOrang Filistin berperang melawan orang Israel. Orang-orang Israel melarikan diri dari hadapan orang Filistin dan banyak yang mati terbunuh di pegunungan Gilboa.

10:1 1a And the Philistines fought against Israel, and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines and fell down slain on Mount Gilboa.

10:2 Orang Filistin terus mengejar Saul dan anak-anaknya dan menewaskan aYonatan, Abinadab dan Malkisua, anak-anak Saul.

10:2 And the Philistines chased Saul and his sons; and the Philistines struck down a Jonathan and Abinadab and Malchi-shua, Sauls sons.

10:3 Kemudian makin beratlah pertempuran itu bagi Saul; para pemanah menjumpainya dan melukainya.

10:3 And the battle bore heavily against Saul, and the archers hit him; and he was wounded by the archers.

10:4 Lalu berkatalah Saul kepada pembawa senjatanya: Hunuslah pedangmu dan tikamlah aku, supaya jangan datang orang-orang yang tidak bersunat ini memperlakukan aku sebagai permainan. Tetapi pembawa senjatanya tidak mau, karena ia sangat asegan. Kemudian Saul mengambil pedang itu dan menjatuhkan dirinya ke atasnya.

10:4 Then Saul said to his armor bearer, Draw your sword, and thrust me through with it, lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me. But his armor bearer would not, for he was very a afraid. So Saul took his sword and fell on it.

10:5 Ketika pembawa senjatanya melihat, bahwa Saul telah mati, ia pun menjatuhkan dirinya ke atas pedangnya, lalu mati.

10:5 And when his armor bearer saw that Saul was dead, he likewise fell on his sword and died.

10:6 Jadi Saul, ketiga anaknya dan segenap keluarganya sama-sama mati.

10:6 So Saul and his three sons died, and all his house died together.

10:7 Ketika dilihat seluruh orang Israel yang di lembah, bahwa tentara telah melarikan diri, dan bahwa Saul serta anak-anaknya sudah mati, maka mereka meninggalkan kota-kota mereka lalu melarikan diri juga; kemudian datanglah orang Filistin dan menetap di sana.

10:7 And when all the men of Israel who were in the valley saw that they had fled and that Saul and his sons were dead, they forsook their cities and fled; and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.

10:8 Ketika keesokan harinya orang Filistin datang merampasi orang-orang yang mati terbunuh itu, didapati mereka Saul dan anak-anaknya tergelimpang di pegunungan Gilboa.

10:8 And the next day the Philistines came to strip the slain, and they found Saul and his sons fallen on Mount Gilboa.

10:9 Mereka merampasinya dan mengambil kepala Saul dan senjata-senjatanya, lalu menyuruh orang berkeliling di negeri orang Filistin untuk menyampaikan kabar itu kepada berhala-berhala mereka dan kepada rakyat.

10:9 And they stripped him and took his head and his armor, and they sent them all around, throughout the land of the Philistines in order to announce the good news to their idols and to the people.

10:10 Kemudian mereka menaruh senjata-senjata Saul di kuil allah mereka, tetapi batu kepalanya dipakukan mereka di rumah aDagon.

10:10 And they put his armor in the house of their gods, and they fastened his head in the house of a Dagon.

10:11 Ketika seluruh Yabesh-Gilead mendengar tentang segala yang telah dilakukan orang Filistin terhadap Saul,

10:11 And when all Jabesh-gilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,

10:12 maka bersiaplah segenap orang gagah perkasa, lalu pergi mengambil mayat Saul dan mayat anak-anaknya. Mereka membawanya ke Yabesh dan menguburkan tulang-tulang mereka di bawah pohon besar, di Yabesh. Sesudah itu berpuasalah mereka tujuh hari lamanya.

10:12 All the valiant men rose up and took the body of Saul and the bodies of his sons; and they brought them to Jabesh and buried their bones under the terebinth at Jabesh, and they fasted seven days.

10:13 Demikianlah Saul mati karena perbuatannya yang tidak setia terhadap Tuhan, oleh karena ia tidak berpegang pada afirman Tuhan, dan juga karena ia telah meminta petunjuk dari barwah,

10:13 So Saul died on account of his unfaithfulness which he committed against Jehovah, because of the a word of Jehovah which he did not keep, and also because he asked the counsel of a b medium, inquiring of it.

10:14 dan tidak meminta petunjuk Tuhan. Sebab itu Tuhan membunuh dia dan menyerahkan ajabatan raja itu kepada Daud bin Isai.

10:14 And he did not inquire of Jehovah; therefore He killed him and turned the a kingdom to David the son of Jesse.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 11

1 CHRONICLES 11

 

 

B. Kekuasaan Daud

B. The reign of David

11:1-29:30

11:1-29:30

1. Dimahkotai dan Diangkat sebagai Raja

1. Crowned and established as king

11:1-9

11:1-9

 

 

11:1 1aLalu berkumpullah seluruh Israel kepada Daud di Hebron dan berkata: Ketahuilah, kami ini darah dagingmu.

11:1 1a Then all Israel gathered themselves to David at Hebron, saying, Here we are, your bone and your flesh.

11:2 Telah lama, ketika Saul memerintah, engkaulah yang memimpin segala gerakan orang Israel. Dan Tuhan, Allahmu, telah berfirman kepadamu: Engkaulah yang harus amenggembalakan umat-Ku Israel, dan engkaulah yang menjadi raja atas umat-Ku Israel.

11:2 Even previously, when Saul was king, it was you who led out and brought in Israel. And Jehovah your God said to you, It is you who shall a shepherd My people Israel, and you shall be ruler over My people Israel.

11:3 Maka datanglah semua tua-tua Israel menghadap raja di Hebron, lalu Daud mengadakan perjanjian dengan mereka di Hebron di hadapan Tuhan, kemudian mereka mengurapi Daud menjadi raja atas Israel, seperti yang difirmankan Tuhan dengan perantaraan Samuel.

11:3 And all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron. And David made a covenant with them in Hebron before Jehovah, and they anointed David king over Israel according to the word of Jehovah spoken by Samuel.

11:4 aLalu Daud dengan seluruh orang Israel pergi ke Yerusalem; itulah Yebus, dan di sana orang Yebus adalah penduduk negeri itu.

11:4 a And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, that is, Jebus; and the Jebusites were the inhabitants of the land there.

11:5 Penduduk Yebus berkata kepada Daud: Engkau tidak sanggup masuk ke mari. Tetapi Daud merebut kubu pertahanan Sion, yaitu kota Daud.

11:5 And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, You shall not come in here. But David took the stronghold of Zion, which is now the city of David.

11:6 Daud telah berkata: Siapa lebih dahulu memukul kalah orang Yebus, ia akan menjadi kepala dan pemimpin. Lalu Yoab, anak Zeruya, yang menyerang lebih dahulu, maka ia menjadi kepala.

11:6 And David said, Whoever strikes the Jebusites first will be the chief and the captain. And Joab the son of Zeruiah went up first, so he became chief.

11:7 Lalu Daud menetap di kubu pertahanan itu, sebab itu orang menamainya: Kota Daud.

11:7 So David dwelt in the stronghold; therefore they called it the city of David.

11:8 Ia memperkuat kota itu sekelilingnya, mulai dari Milo, bahkan sekelilingnya seluruhnya, sedang Yoab membangun kembali selebihnya dari kota itu.

11:8 And he built the city all around, from the Millo even unto the surrounding area, and Joab repaired the rest of the city.

11:9 Lalu makin lama makin besarlah kuasa Daud, sebab Tuhan semesta alam menyertainya.

11:9 And David became greater and greater, and Jehovah of hosts was with him.

 

 

2. Pahlawan-pahlawannya

2. His mighty men

11:10-12:40

11:10-12:40

 

 

11:10 Inilah kepala-kepala para pahlawan yang mengiringi Daud, yang telah memberi dukungan yang kuat kepadanya, bersama-sama seluruh Israel, dalam mencapai kedudukan raja dan yang mengangkat dia sebagai raja, seperti yang difirmankan Tuhan mengenai Israel.

11:10 And these are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who showed themselves strong with him in his kingdom, with all Israel, to make him king according to the word of Jehovah concerning Israel.

11:11 aInilah daftar para pahlawan yang mengiringi Daud: Yasobam bin Hakhmoni, kepala triwira; ia mengayunkan tombaknya melawan tiga ratus orang yang tertikam mati dalam satu pertempuran.

11:11 a And these are the number of the mighty men whom David had: Jashobeam the son of a Hachmonite, the chief of the thirty; he brandished his spear against three hundred, and they were slain at one time.

11:12 Dan sesudah dia, Eleazar anak Dodo, orang Ahohi itu; ia termasuk ketiga pahlawan itu.

11:12 After him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite; he was among the three mighty men.

11:13 Ia ada bersama-sama Daud di Pas-Damim, ketika orang Filistin berkumpul di sana untuk berperang. Ada sebidang tanah ladang penuh jelai di sana; ketika tentara melarikan diri dari hadapan orang Filistin,

11:13 He was with David at Pas-dammim, and the Philistines gathered themselves there for battle, and there was a plot of land full of barley there; and the people fled before the Philistines.

11:14 maka berdirilah mereka di tengah-tengah ladang itu; mereka dapat mempertahankannya dan memukul kalah orang Filistin. Demikianlah diberikan Tuhan kemenangan yang besar.

11:14 But they stationed themselves in the midst of the plot and delivered it and struck the Philistines, and Jehovah accomplished a great salvation.

11:15 Sekali datanglah tiga orang dari ketiga puluh kepala ke gunung batu mendapatkan Daud dekat gua Adulam, sedang tentara orang Filistin berkemah di lembah Refaim.

11:15 Now three of the thirty chief men went down to the rock to David in the cave of Adullam while the army of the Philistines was encamped in the valley of Rephaim.

11:16 Pada waktu itu Daud ada di dalam kubu gunung dan pasukan pendudukan orang Filistin pada waktu itu ada di Betlehem.

11:16 Now at that time David was in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was in Bethlehem at that time.

11:17 Lalu timbullah keinginan pada Daud, dan ia berkata: Sekiranya ada orang yang memberi aku minum air dari perigi Betlehem yang ada dekat pintu gerbang!

11:17 And David said longingly, If only someone would give me water to drink from the well of Bethlehem that is by the gate!

11:18 Lalu ketiga orang itu menerobos perkemahan orang Filistin, mereka menimba air dari perigi Betlehem yang ada dekat pintu gerbang, mengangkatnya dan membawanya kepada Daud. Tetapi Daud tidak mau meminumnya, melainkan mempersembahkannya sebagai kurban curahan kepada Tuhan,

11:18 And the three burst through the camp of the Philistines and drew water from the well of Bethlehem that is by the gate. And they carried it and brought it to David, but David would not drink it; rather he poured it out to Jehovah.

11:19 katanya: Jauhlah dari padaku, ya Allah, untuk berbuat demikian! Patutkah aku meminum darah taruhan nyawa orang-orang ini? Sebab dengan mempertaruhkan nyawanya mereka membawanya. Dan tidak mau ia meminumnya. Itulah yang dilakukan ketiga pahlawan itu.

11:19 And he said, Far be it from me, before my God, that I should do this! Shall I drink the blood of these men who went at the risk of their lives? For at the risk of their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things the three mighty men did.

11:20 Abisai, adik Yoab, dialah kepala ketiga puluh orang itu. Dan dialah yang mengayunkan tombaknya melawan tiga ratus orang yang mati ditikamnya; ia mendapat nama di antara ketiga puluh orang itu.

11:20 And Abishai the brother of Joab was chief of the three. And he brandished his spear against three hundred, who were slain; and he had a name among the three.

11:21 Di antara 1ketiga puluh orang itu ia paling dihormati. Memang ia menjadi pemimpin mereka, tetapi ia tidak dapat menyamai triwira itu.

11:21 He was indeed honored among the two of the 1 thirty, and he became their leader; but he did not attain to the three.

11:22 Selanjutnya Benaya bin Yoyada, anak seorang yang gagah perkasa, yang besar jasanya, yang berasal dari Kabzeel; ia menewaskan kedua pahlawan besar dari Moab. Juga pernah ia turun ke dalam lobang dan membunuh seekor singa pada suatu hari bersalju.

11:22 And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man from Kabzeel, was great in mighty deeds. He struck the two sons of Ariel the Moabite; he also went down and struck a lion in the midst of a pit on a snowy day.

11:23 Pula ia membunuh seorang Mesir, seorang yang tinggi perawakannya lima hasta tingginya; di tangan orang Mesir itu ada tombak seperti pesa tukang tenun, tetapi ia mendatanginya dengan tongkat, merampas tombak itu dari tangan orang Mesir itu, lalu membunuh orang itu dengan tombaknya sendiri.

11:23 And he struck an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits tall. And the Egyptian had a spear in his hand like a weavers beam, but he went down to him with a staff and snatched the spear out of the hand of the Egyptian and slew him with his own spear.

11:24 Itulah yang diperbuat Benaya bin Yoyada; ia mendapat nama di antara ketiga puluh pahlawan itu.

11:24 These things Benaiah the son of Jehoiada did, and he had a name among the three mighty men.

11:25 Sesungguhnya, di antara ketiga puluh orang itu ia paling dihormati, tetapi ia tidak dapat menyamai triwira. Dan Daud mengangkat dia mengepalai pengawalnya.

11:25 He was indeed more honored than the thirty, but he did not attain to the three. And David set him over his bodyguard.

11:26 Pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa ialah juga Asael, saudara Yoab, selanjutnya Elhanan bin Dodo, dari Betlehem;

11:26 And the mighty men of the armies were: Asahel the brother of Joab; Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem;

11:27 Samot, 1orang Harod; Heles, orang Peloni;

11:27 Shammoth the 1 Harodite; Helez the Pelonite;

11:28 Ira anak Ikesh orang Tekoa; Abiezer, orang Anatot;

11:28 Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite; Abiezer the Anathothite;

11:29 Sibkhai, orang Husa; Ilai, orang Ahohi;

11:29 Sibbecai the Hushathite; Ilai the Ahohite;

11:30 Maharai, orang Netofa; Heled bin Baana, orang Netofa;

11:30 Maharai the Netophathite; Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite;

11:31 Itai bin ribai, dari Gibea orang Benyamin; Benaya, orang Piraton;

11:31 Ithai the son of Ribai from Gibeah of the children of Benjamin; Benaiah the Pirathonite;

11:32 Hurai dari lembah-lembah Gaas; Abiel, orang Bet-Araba;

11:32 Hurai from the brooks of Gaash; Abiel the Arbathite;

11:33 Azmawet, orang Bahurim; Elyahba, orang Saalbon;

11:33 Azmaveth the Baharumite; Eliahba the Shaalbonite;

11:34 Hasyem orang Gizon; Yonatan bin Sage, orang Harari;

11:34 Of the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shagee the Hararite;

11:35 Ahiam bin Sakhar, orang Harari; Elifal bin Ur;

11:35 Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite; Eliphal the son of Ur;

11:36 Hefer, orang Mekherati; Ahia, orang Peloni;

11:36 Hepher the Mecherathite; Ahijah the Pelonite;

11:37 Hezro, orang Karmel; Naarai bin Esbai;

11:37 Hezro the Carmelite; Naarai the son of Ezbai;

11:38 YoEl, saudara Natan; Mibhar bin Hagri;

11:38 Joel the brother of Nathan; Mibhar the son of Hagri;

11:39 Zelek, orang Amon; Naharai, orang Beerot, pembawa senjata Yoab anak Zeruya;

11:39 Zelek the Ammonite; Naharai the Beerothite, the armor bearer to Joab the son of Zeruiah;

11:40 Ira, orang Yetri; Gareb, orang Yetri;

11:40 Ira the Ithrite; Gareb the Ithrite;

11:41 aUria, orang Het; Zabad bin Ahlai;

11:41 a Uriah the Hittite; Zabad the son of Ahlai;

11:42 Adina anak Siza orang Ruben, kepala orang-orang Ruben dan beserta dia ada tiga puluh orang;

11:42 Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a chief of the Reubenites, and thirty with him;

11:43 Hanan bin Maakha; Yosafat, orang Mitni;

11:43 Hanan the son of Maacah and Joshaphat the Mithnite;

11:44 Uzia, orang Asytarot; Syama dan Yeiel, anak-anak Hotam orang AroEr;

11:44 Uzzia the Ashterathite; Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite;

11:45 Yediael bin Simri, dan Yoha, saudaranya, orang Tizi;

11:45 Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite;

11:46 Eliel, orang Mahawim; Yeribai dan Yosawya, anak-anak Elnaam; Yitma, orang Moab;

11:46 Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai and Joshaviah the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite;

11:47 Eliel, Obed dan Yaasiel, orang Mezobaya.

11:47 Eliel and Obed and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 12

1 CHRONICLES 12

12:1 Inilah orang-orang yang datang kepada Daud di a Ziklag, selama ia harus menyingkir karena Saul bin Kish. Mereka pun termasuk pahlawan-pahlawan yang membantu dia dalam peperangan.

12:1 Now these are those who came to David at a Ziklag while he was still hidden away because of Saul the son of Kish, and they were among the mighty men who helped him in battle.

12:2 Mereka bersenjatakan panah, dan sanggup melontarkan batu dan menembakkan anak-anak panah dari busur dengan tangan kanan atau tangan kiri. Mereka itu dari saudara-saudara sesuku Saul, dari orang Benyamin:

12:2 They drew the bow, and with both right and left hands they could sling stones and shoot arrows with the bow; they were from among the brothers of Saul from Benjamin.

12:3 Abiezer, kepala, dan Yoas, anak-anak Semaa orang Gibea; Yeziel dan Pelet, anak-anak Azmawet, Berakha dan Yehu, orang Anatot;

12:3 The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Beracah and Jehu the Anathothite;

12:4 Yismaya, orang Gibeon, seorang pahlawan di antara ketiga puluh orang itu, yang mengepalai tiga puluh orang; Yeremia, Yehaziel, Yohanan dan Yozabad, orang Gedera;

12:4 And Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty and over the thirty; and Jeremiah and Jahaziel and Johanan and Jozabad the Gederathite;

12:5 Eluzai, Yerimot, Bealya, Semarya dan Sefaca, orang Harufi;

12:5 Eluzai and Jerimoth and Bealiah and Shemariah and Shephatiah the Haruphite;

12:6 Elkana, Yisia, Azareel, YoEzer dan Yasobam, orang-orang Korah;

12:6 Elkanah and Isshiah and Azarel and Joezer and Jashobeam, the Korahites;

12:7 YoEla, Zebaja, anak-anak Yeroham, dari Gedor.

12:7 And Joelah and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

12:8 Juga dari orang Gad ada yang memisahkan diri dan pergi kepada Daud ke kubu di padang gurun, yakni pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, orang-orang yang sanggup berperang, yang pandai menggunakan perisai dan tombak, dan rupa mereka seperti singa dan cepatnya seperti kijang di atas pegunungan.

12:8 And some of the Gadites separated themselves unto David at the stronghold in the wilderness, mighty men of valor, men fit for the service of war, who could wield shield and spear and whose faces were like the faces of lions; and they were as swift as gazelles upon the mountains:

12:9 Ezer, kepala, Obaja, orang kedua; Eliab, orang ketiga;

12:9 Ezer the chief, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,

12:10 Mismana, orang keempat; Yeremia, orang kelima;

12:10 Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,

12:11 Atai, orang keenam; Eliel, orang ketujuh;

12:11 Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,

12:12 Yohanan, orang kedelapan; Elzabad, orang kesembilan;

12:12 Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,

12:13 Yeremia, orang kesepuluh; Makhbanai, orang kesebelas.

12:13 Jeremiah the tenth, Machbannai the eleventh.

12:14 Mereka itulah dari bani Gad, kepala-kepala pasukan; satu orang yang paling kecil sanggup melawan seratus orang, dan yang paling besar sanggup melawan seribu orang.

12:14 These from among the sons of Gad were heads of the army; he who was least was equal to a hundred, and the greatest to a thousand.

12:15 Mereka itulah yang menyeberangi sungai Yordan di bulan pertama, sekalipun sungai itu meluap sepanjang tepinya dan merekalah yang menghalau seluruh penduduk lembah ke sebelah timur dan ke sebelah barat.

12:15 These are the ones who crossed over the Jordan in the first month, when it overflowed all its banks; and they put to flight all those of the valleys, to the east and to the west.

12:16 Sebagian dari bani Benyamin dan Yehuda datang kepada Daud di kubu itu,

12:16 And some of the children of Benjamin and Judah came to David at the stronghold.

12:17 lalu keluarlah Daud menyongsong mereka. Berkatalah ia kepada mereka: Jika kamu datang kepadaku dengan maksud damai untuk membantu aku, maka aku rela bersekutu dengan kamu, tetapi jika untuk menyerahkan aku dengan tipu muslihat kepada lawanku, sedang aku tidak melakukan kelaliman, maka biarlah Allah nenek moyang kita melihat itu dan menghukum kamu.

12:17 And David went out to meet them; and he responded and said to them, If you have come to me in peace in order to help me, my heart will be knit to you; but if you have come to betray me to my adversaries, though there is no wrong in my hands, may the God of our fathers see and reprove.

12:18 Lalu Roh 1menguasai Amasai, kepala ketiga puluh orang itu: Kami ini bagimu, hai Daud, dan pada pihakmu, hai anak Isai! Sejahtera, sejahtera bagimu dan sejahtera bagi penolongmu, sebab yang menolong engkau ialah Allahmu! Kemudian Daud menyambut mereka dan mengangkat mereka menjadi kepala pasukan.

12:18 Then the Spirit 1 came upon Amasai, the head of the thirty, and he said, We are yours, O David, And are with you, O son of Jesse. Peace, peace be with you, And peace with those who help you; For your God helps you. And David received them and made them heads of the troops.

12:19 Juga dari Manasye ada yang menyeberang memihak kepada Daud, ketika ia bersama-sama orang Filistin memerangi Saul. Sebenarnya ia tidak menolong mereka, sebab setelah mengambil keputusan raja-raja kota orang Filistin itu menyuruh dia pergi, katanya: Mungkin, dengan taruhan kepala kita, ia menyeberang memihak kepada tuannya, Saul.

12:19 And some from Manasseh fell away to David when he came with the Philistines for battle against Saul. (But they did not help them, for the lords of the Philistines, upon deliberation, sent him away, saying, He will fall back to his master Saul at the cost of our heads.)

12:20 Pada perjalanannya ke Ziklag sebagian dari suku Manasye: Adnah, Yozabad, Yediael, Mikhael, Yozabad, Elihu dan Ziletai, kepala-kepala pasukan seribu suku Manasye menyeberang memihak kepadanya.

12:20 As he went to Ziklag, some fell away to him: Adnah and Jozabad and Jediael and Michael and Jozabad and Elihu and Zillethai, captains of thousands who were from Manasseh.

12:21 Mereka ini membantu Daud melawan gerombolan, sebab mereka semua adalah pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa dan kepala dalam tentara.

12:21 And they helped David against the band of raiders, for they were all mighty men of valor, and they were captains of the army.

12:22 Dari hari ke hari orang datang kepada Daud untuk membantu dia sehingga mereka menjadi tentara yang besar, seperti bala tentara Allah.

12:22 Indeed day by day they came to David to help him, until there was a great army, like the army of God.

12:23 Inilah jumlah pasukan bersenjata untuk berperang yang datang kepada Daud di Hebron untuk menyerahkan jabatan raja dari pada Saul kepada Daud, sesuai dengan titah Tuhan.

12:23 And these are the numbers of the heads of those who were armed for war and came to David at Hebron to turn the kingdom of Saul unto him according to the word of Jehovah:

12:24 Bani Yehuda yang mengangkat perisai dan tombak ada enam ribu delapan ratus orang yang siap untuk berperang.

12:24 The children of Judah who carried shield and spear were six thousand eight hundred, armed for war;

12:25 Dari bani Simeon pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa untuk berperang ada tujuh ribu seratus orang.

12:25 Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valor for the war, seven thousand one hundred;

12:26 Dari bani Lewi ada empat ribu enam ratus orang,

12:26 Of the children of Levi, four thousand six hundred.

12:27 ditambah dengan Yoyada, pemimpin kaum Harun dan bersama-sama dia ada tiga ribu tujuh ratus orang;

12:27 And Jehoiada was the leader of the house of Aaron; and with him were three thousand seven hundred;

12:28 selanjutnya Zadok, seorang pahlawan muda yang gagah perkasa dengan dua puluh dua orang pemimpin dari puaknya.

12:28 As well as Zadok, a young mighty man of valor; and from his fathers house, twenty-two captains;

12:29 Dari bani Benyamin, saudara-saudara sesuku Saul, ada tiga ribu orang; sampai pada waktu itu kebanyakan dari mereka masih tetap patuh kepada keluarga Saul.

12:29 And of the children of Benjamin, the brothers of Saul, three thousand; for until that time the greater part of them kept their allegiance to the house of Saul;

12:30 Dari bani Efraim dua puluh ribu delapan ratus orang pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, orang-orang yang kenamaan di antara puak-puak mereka.

12:30 And of the children of Ephraim, twenty thousand eight hundred mighty men of valor, men of renown in their fathers houses;

12:31 Dari suku Manasye, suku yang setengah itu ada delapan belas ribu orang yang ditunjuk dengan disebut namanya untuk pergi mengangkat Daud menjadi raja.

12:31 And of the half-tribe of Manasseh, eighteen thousand, who were designated by name to come and make David king.

12:32 Dari bani Isakhar orang-orang yang mempunyai pengertian tentang saat-saat yang baik, sehingga mereka mengetahui apa yang harus diperbuat orang Israel: dua ratus orang kepala dengan segala saudara sesukunya yang di bawah perintah mereka.

12:32 And of the children of Issachar, men who understood the times that they might know what Israel should do, the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brothers were at their command;

12:33 Dari Zebulon orang-orang yang sanggup berperang, yang pandai berperang dengan berbagai-bagai senjata: lima puluh ribu orang, yang siap memberi bantuan dengan tidak bercabang hati.

12:33 Of Zebulun, those who were able to go forth in war, who could set the battle in array with all the equipment of war, were fifty thousand, and they helped David without a double heart;

12:34 Dari Naftali seribu orang pemimpin dan bersama-sama mereka tiga puluh tujuh ribu orang yang membawa perisai dan tombak.

12:34 And of Naphtali, one thousand captains, and with them, with shield and spear, thirty-seven thousand;

12:35 Dari orang Dan orang-orang yang siap untuk berperang: dua puluh delapan ribu enam ratus orang.

12:35 And of the Danites who could set the battle in array, twenty-eight thousand six hundred;

12:36 Dari Asyer orang-orang yang sanggup dan pandai untuk berperang: empat puluh ribu orang.

12:36 And of Asher, those who were able to go forth in war, who could set the battle in array, forty thousand;

12:37 Dari seberang sungai Yordan, yakni dari orang Ruben, orang Gad dan setengah suku Manasye yang lain, orang-orang yang membawa berbagai-bagai senjata perang: seratus dua puluh ribu orang.

12:37 And on the other side of the Jordan, of the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh, with all the equipment of war for the battle, one hundred twenty thousand.

12:38 Sekaliannya itu, prajurit-prajurit, orang-orang dalam barisan tempur, datang ke Hebron dengan tulus hati untuk mengangkat Daud menjadi raja atas seluruh Israel; memang juga seluruh orang Israel yang lain dengan bulat hati hendak mengangkat Daud menjadi raja.

12:38 All these, men of war who could order the battle array, came with a perfect heart to Hebron to make David king over all Israel; and all the rest of Israel as well were of one heart to make David king.

12:39 Mereka tinggal di sana bersama-sama Daud tiga hari lamanya, makan dan minum, sebab saudara-saudara mereka menyajikan makanan bagi mereka.

12:39 And they were there with David for three days, eating and drinking; for their brothers had provided for them.

12:40 Juga orang-orang yang tinggal dekat mereka, bahkan dari Isakhar, Zebulon dan Naftali, membawa makanan dengan memakai keledai, unta, bagal dan lembu, yakni bahan makanan tepung, kue ara dan kue kismis, anggur dan minyak, lembu sapi dan kambing domba, dalam jumlah besar, sebab ada sukacita di Israel.

12:40 Moreover those near them, as far as Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses and on camels and on mules and on oxenprovisions of flour, cakes of figs, and clusters of raisins, and wine and oil, and oxen and sheep, in abundance; for there was joy in Israel.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 13

1 CHRONICLES 13

 

 

3. Menjaga Tempat Kediaman Tabut Allah

3. Taking care of the habitation of the Ark of God

13:1-16:43

13:1-16:43

 

 

13:1 Daud berunding dengan pemimpin-pemimpin pasukan seribu dan pasukan seratus dan dengan semua pemuka.

13:1 And David took counsel with the captains of the thousands and of the hundreds, with every leader.

13:2 Berkatalah Daud kepada seluruh jemaah Israel: Jika kamu anggap baik dan jika diperkenankan Tuhan, Allah kita, baiklah kita menyuruh orang kepada saudara-saudara kita yang masih tinggal di daerah-daerah orang Israel, dan di samping itu kepada para imam dan orang-orang Lewi yang ada di kota-kota yang dikelilingi tanah penggembalaan mereka, supaya mereka berkumpul kepada kita.

13:2 And David said to all the congregation of Israel, If it seems good to you, and it is from Jehovah our God, let us send far and wide to our brothers who remain in all the land of Israel and to the priests and the Levites who are with them in their cities with pasture lands, that they may gather themselves to us.

13:3 Dan baiklah kita memindahkan atabut Allah kita ke tempat kita, sebab pada zaman Saul kita tidak mengindahkannya.

13:3 And let us bring back the a Ark of our God to ourselves, for we did not inquire of it in the days of Saul.

13:4 Maka seluruh jemaah itu berkata, bahwa mereka akan berbuat demikian, sebab usul itu dianggap baik oleh segenap bangsa itu.

13:4 And all the congregation said that they would do so, for the matter was right in the sight of all the people.

13:5 Lalu Daud mengumpulkan semua orang Israel dari sungai Sikhor di Mesir sampai ke jalan yang menuju Hamat, untuk menjemput tabut Allah dari Kiryat-Yearim.

13:5 And David gathered all Israel together from the 1 Shihor of Egypt even to the entrance of Hamath to bring the Ark of God from Kiriath-jearim.

 

 

13:6 aLalu Daud dan segenap orang Israel berangkat ke Baala, ke Kiryat-Yearim, yang termasuk wilayah Yehuda, untuk mengangkut dari sana tabut Allah, yang disebut dengan nama Tuhan yang bertakhta di atas kerubim.

13:6 a And David went up with all Israel to Baalah, that is, to Kiriath-jearim, which is Judahs, to bring up from there the Ark of God, of Jehovah, who is enthroned between the cherubim, which is called by the Name;

13:7 Mereka menaikkan tabut Allah itu ke dalam kereta yang baru dari rumah Abinadab, sedang Uza dan Ahyo mengantarkan kereta itu.

13:7 And they set the Ark of God upon a new cart from the house of Abinadab, and Uzzah and Ahio drove the cart.

13:8 Daud dan seluruh orang Israel menari-nari di hadapan Allah dengan sekuat tenaga, diiringi nyanyian, kecapi, gambus, rebana, ceracap dan nafiri.

13:8 And David and all Israel played before God with all their strength, even with songs and with lyres and with harps and with tambourines and with cymbals and with trumpets.

13:9 Ketika mereka sampai ke tempat pengirikan Kidon, maka Uza mengulurkan tangannya memegang tabut itu, karena lembu-lembu itu tergelincir.

13:9 And when they came to Chidons threshing floor, Uzzah stretched out his hand to take hold of the Ark; for the oxen had stumbled.

13:10 Maka bangkitlah murka Tuhan terhadap Uza, lalu Ia membunuh dia oleh karena Uza telah mengulurkan tangannya akepada tabut itu; ia mati di sana di hadapan Allah.

13:10 And the anger of Jehovah was kindled against Uzzah, and He struck him because he stretched out his hand a to the Ark; and he died there before God.

13:11 Daud menjadi marah, karena Tuhan telah menyambar Uza demikian hebatnya; maka tempat itu disebut orang Peres-Uza sampai sekarang.

13:11 And David was angry because Jehovah had broken forth with an outburst upon Uzzah, and he called that place Perez-uzzah, as it is to this day.

13:12 Pada waktu itu Daud menjadi takut kepada Allah, lalu katanya: Bagaimanakah aku dapat membawa tabut Allah itu ke tempatku?

13:12 And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the Ark of God to myself?

13:13 Sebab itu Daud tidak mau memindahkan tabut itu ke tempatnya, ke kota Daud, tetapi Daud menyimpang dan membawanya ke rumah Obed-Edom, orang Gat itu.

13:13 So David did not remove the Ark to himself to the city of David, but he carried it aside into the house of Obed-edom the Gittite.

13:14 Tiga bulan lamanya tabut Allah itu tinggal pada keluarga Obed-Edom di rumahnya dan Tuhan memberkati keluarga Obed-Edom dan segala yang dipunyainya.

13:14 And the Ark of God remained with the house of Obed-edom in his house three months, and Jehovah blessed the house of Obed-edom and all that he had.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 14

1 CHRONICLES 14

 

 

14:1 aHiram, raja negeri Tirus, mengirim utusan kepada Daud dan kayu aras, tukang-tukang batu dan tukang-tukang kayu untuk mendirikan sebuah istana baginya.

14:1 a And Hiram the king of Tyre sent messengers to David, as well as cedar timbers and masons and carpenters to build a house for him.

14:2 Lalu tahulah Daud, bahwa Tuhan telah menegakkan dia sebagai raja atas Israel, sebab martabat pemerintahannya terangkat tinggi oleh karena Israel umat-Nya.

14:2 And David perceived that Jehovah had established him as king over Israel and that his kingdom was highly exalted for the sake of His people Israel.

14:3 Daud mengambil lagi beberapa isteri di Yerusalem, dan ia memperanakkan lagi anak-anak lelaki dan perempuan.

14:3 And David took more wives in Jerusalem, and David begot more sons and daughters.

14:4 aInilah nama anak-anak yang lahir bagi dia di Yerusalem: Syamua, Sobab, Natan, Salomo,

14:4 a And these are the names of those who were born, whom he had in Jerusalem: Shammua and Shobab and Nathan and Solomon

14:5 Yibhar, Elisua, Elpelet,

14:5 And Ibhar and Elishua and Elpelet

14:6 Nogah, Nefeg, Yafia,

14:6 And Nogah and Nepheg and Japhia

14:7 Elisama, Beelyada dan Elifelet.

14:7 And Elishama and Beeliada and Eliphelet.

14:8 Ketika didengar orang Filistin, bahwa Daud telah diurapi menjadi raja atas seluruh Israel, maka majulah semua orang Filistin untuk menangkap Daud. Tetapi Daud mendengar hal itu, lalu majulah ia menghadapi mereka.

14:8 Now when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up in search of David; and David heard of it and went out against them.

14:9 Ketika orang Filistin itu datang dan mengadakan penyerbuan di lembah Refaim,

14:9 And the Philistines came and made a raid in the valley of Rephaim.

14:10 bertanyalah Daud kepada Allah: Apakah aku harus maju melawan orang Filistin itu dan akan Kauserahkankah mereka ke dalam tanganku? Tuhan menjawab: Majulah, Aku akan menyerahkan mereka ke dalam tanganmu.

14:10 Then David inquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? Will You deliver them into my hand? And Jehovah said to him, Go up, and I will deliver them into your hand.

14:11 Lalu majulah ia ke Baal-Perasim, dan Daud memukul mereka kalah di sana. Berkatalah Daud: Allah telah menerobos musuhku dengan perantaraanku seperti air menerobos. Sebab itu orang menamakan tempat itu Baal-Perasim.

14:11 And they went up to Baal-perazim, and David struck them there. And David said, God has broken forth upon my enemies by my hand like the breaking forth of a flood. Therefore they called the name of that place Baal-perazim.

14:12 Orang Filistin itu meninggalkan para allahnya di sana, lalu orang Israel amembakarnya habis atas perintah Daud.

14:12 And they left their gods there; and David gave the order, and they were a burned with fire.

14:13 Ketika orang Filistin menyerbu sekali lagi di lembah itu,

14:13 And the Philistines made yet another raid in the valley.

14:14 maka bertanyalah lagi Daud kepada Allah, lalu Allah menjawab: Janganlah maju di belakang mereka, tetapi buatlah gerakan lingkaran terhadap mereka, sehingga engkau dapat menyerang mereka dari jurusan pohon-pohon kertau.

14:14 And David inquired again of God, and God said to him, You shall not go up after them; go around behind them, and come upon them opposite the balsam trees.

 

 

 

 

14:15 Dan bila engkau mendengar bunyi derap langkah di puncak pohon-pohon kertau itu, maka haruslah engkau keluar bertempur, sebab Allah telah keluar berperang di depanmu untuk memukul kalah 1tentara orang Filistin.

14:15 And when you hear the sound of marching in the tops of the balsam trees, then you shall go out to battle; for God will have gone forth before you to strike the 1 army of the Philistines.

14:16 Dan Daud berbuat seperti yang diperintahkan Allah kepadanya, maka mereka memukul kalah tentara orang Filistin, mulai dari Gibeon sampai Gezer.

14:16 And David did as God had commanded him, and they struck down the army of the Philistines from Gibeon even unto Gezer.

14:17 Lalu termasyhurlah nama Daud di segala negeri, dan Tuhan mendatangkan rasa takut kepadanya atas segala bangsa.

14:17 And Davids fame went forth among all the lands, and Jehovah put the fear of him upon all the nations.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 15

1 CHRONICLES 15

 

 

15:1 Daud membuat bagi dirinya gedung-gedung di kota Daud, lalu ia menyiapkan tempat bagi tabut Allah dan membentangkan akemah untuk itu.

15:1 And David made houses for himself in the city of David, and he prepared a place for the Ark of God and pitched a a tent for it.

15:2 Ketika itu berkatalah Daud: Janganlah ada yang mengangkat tabut Allah selain dari orang Lewi, sebab merekalah yang dipilih Tuhan untuk amengangkat tabut Tuhan dan untuk menyelenggarakannya sampai selama-lamanya.

15:2 Then David said, None should bear the Ark of God except the Levites, for Jehovah has chosen them to a bear the Ark of Jehovah and to minister to Him forever.

15:3 Kemudian Daud mengumpulkan segenap Israel ke Yerusalem untuk mengangkut 1tabut Tuhan ke tempat yang telah disiapkannya untuk itu.

15:3 So David assembled all Israel at Jerusalem in order to bring up the 1 Ark of Jehovah to its place, which he had prepared for it.

15:4 Daud mengumpulkan bani Harun dan orang Lewi:

15:4 And David gathered the sons of Aaron and the Levites:

15:5 dari bani Kehat: Uriel, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: seratus dua puluh orang;

15:5 Of the sons of Kohath, Uriel the leader, and his brothers, one hundred twenty;

15:6 dari bani Merari: Asaya, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: dua ratus dua puluh orang;

15:6 Of the sons of Merari, Asaiah the leader, and his brothers, two hundred twenty;

15:7 dari bani Gerson: YoEl, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: seratus tiga puluh orang;

15:7 Of the sons of Gershom, Joel the leader, and his brothers, one hundred thirty;

15:8 dari bani Elsafan: Semaya, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: dua ratus orang;

15:8 Of the sons of Elizaphan, Shemaiah the leader, and his brothers, two hundred;

15:9 dari bani Hebron: Eliel, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: delapan puluh orang;

15:9 Of the sons of Hebron, Eliel the leader, and his brothers, eighty;

15:10 dari bani Uziel: Aminadab, seorang pemimpin, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya: seratus dua belas orang.

15:10 Of the sons of Uzziel, Amminadab the leader, and his brothers, one hundred twelve.

15:12 And he said to them, You are the heads of the fathers houses of the Levites; sanctify yourselves, you and your brothers, and bring up the Ark of Jehovah the God of Israel to the place that I have prepared for it.

15:13 Sebab oleh karena pada pertama kali kamu tidak hadir, maka Tuhan, Allah kita, telah amenyambar di tengah-tengah kita, sebab kita tidak meminta petunjuk-Nya seperti seharusnya.

15:13 For because you did not bring it up the first time, Jehovah our God a broke forth upon us; for we did not seek Him according to the ordinance.

15:14 Jadi para imam dan orang-orang Lewi menguduskan dirinya untuk mengangkut tabut Tuhan, Allah Israel.

15:14 So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves in order to bring up the Ark of Jehovah the God of Israel.

15:15 Kemudian bani Lewi mengangkat tabut Allah itu dengan agandar pengusung di atas bahu mereka, seperti yang diperintahkan Musa, sesuai dengan firman Tuhan.

15:15 And the sons of the Levites bore the Ark of God as Moses had commanded, according to the word of Jehovah, upon their shoulders with the a poles upon them.

15:16 Daud memerintahkan para kepala orang Lewi itu, supaya mereka menyuruh berdiri saudara-saudara sepuak mereka, yakni para penyanyi, dengan membawa alat-alat musik seperti gambus, kecapi dan ceracap, untuk memperdengarkan dengan nyaring lagu-lagu gembira.

15:16 And David told the leaders of the Levites to appoint their brothers as singers with musical instrumentsharps, lyres, loud-sounding cymbalsto raise sounds of joy.

15:17 Maka orang Lewi itu menyuruh berdiri aHeman bin YoEl; dan dari saudara-saudara sepuaknya: bAsaf bin Berekhya; dari bani Merari, saudara-saudara sepuak mereka: cEtan bin Kusaya;

15:17 So the Levites appointed a Heman the son of Joel; and of his brothers, b Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brothers, c Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

15:18 dan bersama-sama mereka itu saudara-saudara mereka dari tingkat kedua: Zakharia, 1Yaaziel, Semiramot, Yehiel, Uni, Eliab, Benaya, Maaseya, Matica, Elifele, Mikneya, dan Obed-Edom serta Yeiel, para penunggu pintu gerbang.

15:18 And with them their brothers of the second order: Zechariah, 1 and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth and Jehiel and Unni, Eliab and Benaiah and Maaseiah and Mattithiah and Eliphelehu and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom and Jeiel, the doorkeepers.

15:19 Para penyanyi, yakni Heman, Asaf dan Etan harus memperdengarkan lagu dengan ceracap tembaga.

15:19 So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound aloud with bronze cymbals;

15:20 Zakharia, Aziel, Semiramot, Yehiel, Uni, Eliab, Maaseya, Benaya harus memainkan gambus yang 1tinggi nadanya,

15:20 And Zechariah and Aziel and Shemiramoth and Jehiel and Unni and Eliab and Maaseiah and Benaiah with harps set to 1 alamoth;

15:21 sedang Matica, Elifele, Mikneya, Obed-Edom, Yeiel dan Azazya harus memainkan kecapi yang 1delapan nada lebih rendah tingkatnya untuk mengiringi nyanyian.

15:21 And Mattithiah and Eliphelehu and Mikneiah and Obed-edom and Jeiel and Azaziah were appointed to lead with lyres set to 1 sheminith.

15:22 Kenanya, pemimpin orang Lewi, mendapat tugas pengangkutan; ia mengepalai pengangkutan, sebab ia paham dalam hal itu.

15:22 And Chenaniah, the leader of the Levites, was over the song; he instructed about the song, because he was skillful.

15:23 Berekhya dan Elkana adalah penunggu pintu pada tabut;

15:23 And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the Ark.

15:24 dan Sebanya, Yosafat, Netaneel, Amasai, Zakharia, Benaya dan Eliezer, yakni imam-imam itu, meniup anafiri di hadapan tabut Allah, sedang Obed-Edom dan Yehia adalah penunggu pintu pada tabut itu.

15:24 And Shebaniah and Joshaphat and Nethanel and Amasai and Zechariah and Benaiah and Eliezer, the priests, blew the a trumpets before the Ark of God; and Obed-edom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the Ark.

15:25 aMaka Daud dan para tua-tua Israel dan para pemimpin pasukan seribu pergi untuk mengangkut tabut perjanjian Tuhan itu dari rumah Obed-Edom dengan sukacita.

15:25 a So David and the elders of Israel and the captains of thousands went to bring up the Ark of the Covenant of Jehovah from the house of Obed-edom with rejoicing.

15:26 Dan oleh karena Allah menolong orang Lewi yang mengangkat tabut perjanjian Tuhan itu, maka dipersembahkanlah tujuh ekor lembu jantan dan tujuh ekor domba jantan.

15:26 And because God helped the Levites who bore the Ark of the Covenant of Jehovah, they sacrificed seven bulls and seven rams.

 

 

15:27 Daud memakai jubah dari kain lenan halus, juga segala orang Lewi yang mengangkat tabut itu dan para penyanyi, dan Kenanya yang mengepalai pengangkutan dan para penyanyi. Daud juga memakai baju aefod dari kain lenan.

15:27 And David was clothed with a fine linen robe, as were all the Levites who bore the Ark and the singers and Chenaniah, the song leader of the singers; and David had on a linen a ephod.

15:28 Seluruh orang Israel mengangkut tabut perjanjian Tuhan itu dengan diiringi sorak dan bunyi sangkakala, nafiri dan ceracap, sambil memperdengarkan permainan gambus dan kecapi.

15:28 So all Israel brought up the Ark of the Covenant of Jehovah with shouting and with the sound of the horn and with trumpets and with cymbals, sounding aloud with harps and lyres.

15:29 Ketika tabut perjanjian Tuhan itu sampai ke kota Daud, maka Mikhal, anak perempuan Saul, menjenguk dari jendela, lalu melihat raja Daud melompat-lompat dan menari-nari. Sebab itu ia memandang rendah Daud dalam hatinya.

15:29 And when the Ark of the Covenant of Jehovah came to the city of David, Michal the daughter of Saul looked down through a window and saw King David dancing and playing; and she despised him in her heart.

 

 

1 TAWARIKH 16

1 CHRONICLES 16

 

 

16:1 Tabut Allah itu dibawa masuk, lalu diletakkan di tengah-tengah akemah yang dipasang Daud untuk itu, kemudian mereka mempersembahkan kurban bakaran dan kurban keselamatan di hadapan Allah.

16:1 And they brought the Ark of God and set it in the midst of the a tent that David had pitched for it. And they offered up burnt offerings and peace offerings before God.

16:2 And when David finished offering up the burnt offerings and the peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of Jehovah.

16:3 Lalu dibagikannya kepada setiap orang Israel, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan, kepada masing-masing sekeping roti, 1sekerat daging dan sepotong kue kismis.

16:4 Juga adiangkatnya dari orang Lewi itu beberapa orang sebagai pelayan di hadapan tabut Tuhan untuk memasyhurkan Tuhan, Allah Israel dan menyanyikan syukur dan puji-pujian bagi-Nya.

16:4 And he a appointed some of the Levites as ministers before the Ark of Jehovah and to commemorate and thank and praise Jehovah the God of Israel:

16:5 Asaph the chief; and second to him Zechariah; Jeiel and Shemiramoth and Jehiel and Mattithiah and Eliab and Benaiah and Obed-edom and Jeiel, with harps and with lyres; and Asaph sounding aloud with cymbals;

16:6 dan Benaya serta Yahaziel, imam-imam itu, selalu harus meniup nafiri di hadapan tabut perjanjian Allah itu.
